its heavy body. The more the user
outweighs the target, the greater
its damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - エレキボール

description.en:
The user hurls an electric orb at
the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the
damage.
description.cn:
The user hurls an electric orb at
the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the
damage.
description.de:
Je höher die Initiative des
Anwenders im Vergleich zum Ziel
ist, desto stärker trifft dieses
eine geballte Ladung Strom.
description.fr:
Le lanceur envoie une boule
d'électricité. Si sa Vitesse est
plus grande que celle de l'ennemi,
les dégâts augmentent d'autant.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca con una sfera
d'energia elettrica. Più è rapido
rispetto al bersaglio e più danni
arreca.
description.es:
Lanza una bola eléctrica. Cuanto
mayor sea la Velocidad del usuario
sobre la del objetivo, mayor será
el daño causado.
description.ja:
でんきの　かたまりを　あいてに ぶつける。あいてより　すばやさが
はやいほど　いりょくが　あがる。
description.tw:
The user hurls an electric orb at
the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the
damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - じわれ

description.en:
The user opens up a fissure in the
ground and drops the target in. The
target instantly faints if it
hits.
description.cn:
The user opens up a fissure in the
ground and drops the target in. The
target instantly faints if it
hits.
description.de:
Das Ziel wird in eine Erdspalte
geworfen. Ist die Attacke
erfolgreich, führt sie zu einem
K.O.
description.fr:
Le lanceur fait tomber l'ennemi dans
une crevasse. Si cette attaque
réussit, elle met K.O. sur le
coup.
description.it:
Chi la usa crea una spaccatura nel
terreno e cerca di gettarvici
dentro il nemico. Se va a segno, il
nemico va KO.
description.es:
Abre una grieta en el suelo y mete
al objetivo en ella. Fulmina en un
golpe.
description.ja:
じわれの　さけめに あいてを　おとして　こうげきする。
あたれば　いちげきで　ひんしに　する。
description.tw:
The user opens up a fissure in the
ground and drops the target in. The
target instantly faints if it
hits.

name.ja: わざマシン - こうそくいどう

description.en:
The user relaxes and lightens its
body to move faster. It sharply
boosts the Speed stat.
description.cn:
The user relaxes and lightens its
body to move faster. It sharply
boosts the Speed stat.
description.de:
Entspannt den Körper, um den
Initiative-Wert stark zu steigern.
description.fr:
Le lanceur se relaxe et allège son
corps pour augmenter considérablem
ent sa Vitesse.
description.it:
Chi la usa rilassa e alleggerisce il
proprio corpo per far salire di
molto la Velocità.
description.es:
Relaja el cuerpo para ganar mucha
Velocidad.
description.ja:
ちからを　ぬいて　からだを　かるくして こうそくで　うごく。
じぶんの　すばやさを　ぐーんと　あげる。
description.tw:
The user relaxes and lightens its
body to move faster. It sharply
boosts the Speed stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - アシストパワー

description.en:
The user attacks the target with
stored power. The more the user's
stats are raised, the greater the
damage.
description.cn:
The user attacks the target with
stored power. The more the user's
stats are raised, the greater the
damage.
description.de:
Angriff mit angesparter Energie. Je
höher die Statuswerte des
Anwenders, desto stärker fällt die
Attacke aus.
description.fr:
Le lanceur attaque l'ennemi avec une
force accumulée. Plus les stats du
lanceur sont augmentées, plus le
coup est efficace.
description.it:
Attacca il bersaglio con l'energia
accumulata. Più sono state
aumentate le statistiche, maggiore
è il danno inflitto.
description.es:
Acumula poder para golpear. Cuanto
más suban las características del
usuario, mayor será el daño.
description.ja:
ちくせき　された　パワーで　あいてを こうげきする。じぶんの　のうりょ
くが あがって　いるほど　いりょくが　あがる。
description.tw:
The user attacks the target with
stored power. The more the user's
stats are raised, the greater the
damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - たたりめ

description.en:
This relentless attack does massive
damage to a target affected by
status problems.
description.cn:
This relentless attack does massive
damage to a target affected by
status problems.
description.de:
Eine Attacke, bei der der Anwender
das Ziel bedrängt. Fügt Zielen mit
Statusveränderungen hohen Schaden
zu.
description.fr:
Attaque acharnée qui cause davantage
de dégâts à l'ennemi s'il a un
problème de statut.
description.it:
Attacco che causa un danno enorme se
il bersaglio ha problemi di stato.
description.es:
Ataque que causa un gran daño a los
objetivos que sufren problemas de
estado.
description.ja:
たたみかける　ように　こうげきする。 じょうたい　いじょうの　あいてに
おおきな　ダメージを　あたえる。
description.tw:
This relentless attack does massive
damage to a target affected by
status problems.

name.ja: わざマシン - がまん

description.en:
The user endures attacks for two
turns, then strikes back to cause
double the damage taken.
description.cn:
The user endures attacks for two
turns, then strikes back to cause
double the damage taken.
description.de:
Erträgt zwei Runden Angriffe und
schlägt dann mit dem doppelten Wert
des erlittenen Schadens zurück.
description.fr:
Le lanceur encaisse les coups durant
2 tours et réplique en infligeant
le double des dégâts subis.
description.it:
Chi la usa subisce attacchi per due
turni e poi restituisce il danno
moltiplicato per due.
description.es:
Espera dos turnos para atacar con el
doble de potencia del daño
recibido.
description.ja:
２ターンの　あいだ　こうげきに　たえて うけた　ダメージを　２ばいに　
して あいてに　かえす。
description.tw:
The user endures attacks for two
turns, then strikes back to cause
double the damage taken.

name.ja: わざマシン - タマゴばくだん

description.en:
A large egg is hurled at the target
with maximum force to inflict
damage.
description.cn:
A large egg is hurled at the target
with maximum force to inflict
damage.
description.de:
Ein großes Ei wird auf das Ziel
abgefeuert, um ihm zu schaden.
description.fr:
De toutes ses forces, le lanceur
jette un gros œuf sur l'ennemi pour
lui infliger des dégâts.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con un grande
uovo scaraventato con enorme
forza.
description.es:
Arroja un huevo al objetivo con gran
fuerza.
description.ja:
おおきな　タマゴを　ちから　いっぱい あいてに　なげつけて　こうげきす
る。
description.tw:
A large egg is hurled at the target
with maximum force to inflict
damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - ドわすれ

description.en:
The user temporarily empties its
mind to forget its concerns. It
sharply raises the user's Sp. Def
stat.
description.cn:
The user temporarily empties its
mind to forget its concerns. It
sharply raises the user's Sp. Def
stat.
description.de:
Gedächtnisverlust, der die
Spezial-Verteidigung stark erhöht.
description.fr:
Le lanceur fait le vide dans son
esprit pour oublier ses soucis.
Augmente fortement sa Défense
Spéciale.
description.it:
Chi la usa svuota per un po' la
mente per dimenticare i problemi.
La Difesa Speciale aumenta di
molto.
description.es:
El usuario olvida sus preocupaciones
y aumenta mucho la Defensa
Especial.
description.ja:
あたまを　からにして いっしゅん　なにかを　わすれる　ことで
じぶんの　とくぼうを　ぐーんと　あげる。
description.tw:
The user temporarily empties its
mind to forget its concerns. It
sharply raises the user's Sp. Def
stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - シェルブレード

description.en:
The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower
the target's Defense stat.
description.cn:
The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower
the target's Defense stat.
description.de:
Schneideangriff mit einer scharfen
Muschelschale. Senkt eventuell die
Verteidigung des Zieles.
description.fr:
Un coquillage aiguisé lacère
l'ennemi. Peut aussi baisser sa
Défense.
description.it:
Chi la usa colpisce il bersaglio con
il suo guscio affilato. Il colpo
può anche ridurre la Difesa del
bersaglio.
description.es:
Una afilada vieira ataca al
objetivo. También puede hacer
disminuir su Defensa.
description.ja:
するどい　かいがらで　きりつけて こうげきする。あいての　ぼうぎょを
さげることが　ある。
description.tw:
The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower
the target's Defense stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - ヒートスタンプ

description.en:
The user slams its target with its
flame- covered body. The more the
user outweighs the target, the
greater the damage.
description.cn:
The user slams its target with its
flame- covered body. The more the
user outweighs the target, the
greater the damage.
description.de:
Rempelattacke mit brennendem Körper.
Je schwerer der Anwender im
Vergleich zum Ziel ist, desto
stärker die Attacke.
description.fr:
Le lanceur projette son corps
enflammé contre l'ennemi. S'il est
plus lourd que l'ennemi, l'effet
augmente en conséquence.
description.it:
Chi la usa carica con il suo corpo
rovente. Più è pesante rispetto al
bersaglio e più danni causa.
description.es:
El usuario ataca con su cuerpo
ardiente. Cuanto mayor sea su peso
comparado con el del objetivo, más
daño causará.
description.ja:
もえる　からだで　あいてに　ぶつかって こうげきする。じぶんが　あいて
より おもいほど　いりょくが　あがる。
description.tw:
The user slams its target with its
flame- covered body. The more the
user outweighs the target, the
greater the damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - スイープビンタ

description.en:
The user attacks by striking the
target with its hard tail. It hits
the target two to five times in a
row.
description.cn:
The user attacks by striking the
target with its hard tail. It hits
the target two to five times in a
row.
description.de:
Anwender greift das Ziel mit seiner
schlagfesten Rute 2- bis 5-mal
hintereinander an.
description.fr:
Le lanceur frappe l'ennemi de 2 à 5
fois d'affilée avec sa queue
robuste.
description.it:
Chi la usa colpisce il bersaglio con
la sua coda dura da due a cinque
volte di fila.
description.es:
Golpea con la cola u otras partes de
su cuerpo de dos a cinco veces
seguidas.
description.ja:
かたい　しっぽで あいてを　たたいて　こうげきする。
２ー５かいの　あいだ　れんぞくで　だす。
description.tw:
The user attacks by striking the
target with its hard tail. It hits
the target two to five times in a
row.

name.ja: わざマシン - ぼうふう

description.en:
The user attacks by wrapping its
opponent in a fierce wind that
flies up into the sky. It may also
confuse the target.
description.cn:
The user attacks by wrapping its
opponent in a fierce wind that
flies up into the sky. It may also
confuse the target.
description.de:
Anwender greift das Ziel an, indem
er es mit heftigen Windböen umgibt.
Ziel wird eventuell verwirrt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur déclenche une tempête de
vents violents qui s'abat sur
l'ennemi. Peut aussi le rendre
confus.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca il bersaglio
avvolgendolo con un vento
fortissimo. Può anche confonderlo.
description.es:
Golpea al objetivo con un fuerte
torbellino que envuelve al rival y
puede confundirlo.
description.ja:
きょうれつな　かぜで　あいてを つつみこんで　こうげきする。
あいてを　こんらん　させることが　ある。
description.tw:
The user attacks by wrapping its
opponent in a fierce wind that
flies up into the sky. It may also
confuse the target.

name.ja: わざマシン - サイコウェーブ

description.en:
The target is attacked with an odd
psychic wave. The attack varies in
intensity.
description.cn:
The target is attacked with an odd
psychic wave. The attack varies in
intensity.
description.de:
Anwender erzeugt eine mysteriöse
Energiewelle, deren Intensität von
Mal zu Mal unterschiedlich
ausfällt.
description.fr:
Une étrange onde d'énergie chaude
frappe l'ennemi. Cette attaque est
d'intensité variable.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con una strana
onda psichica. Ha un'intensità
variabile.
description.es:
Ataque con una onda de energía de
intensidad variable.
description.ja:
ふしぎな　ねんぱを あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
つかう　たびに　ダメージが　かわる。
description.tw:
The target is attacked with an odd
psychic wave. The attack varies in
intensity.

name.ja: わざマシン - トライアタック

description.en:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn,
freeze, or leave the target with
paralysis.
description.cn:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn,
freeze, or leave the target with
paralysis.
description.de:
Feuert drei Strahlen ab. Verursacht
eventuell Paralyse, Verbrennung
oder Einfrieren.
description.fr:
Le lanceur envoie trois boules
d'énergie simultanément. Peut aussi
paralyser, brûler ou geler
l'ennemi.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con tre sfere
simultanee capaci di paralizzarlo,
scottarlo o forse congelarlo.
description.es:
Ataque triple que puede paralizar,
quemar o congelar al objetivo.
description.ja:
３つの　こうせんで　こうげきする。 まひか　やけどか　こおりじょうたいの
どれかに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
The user strikes with a simultaneous
three-beam attack. May also burn,
freeze, or leave the target with
paralysis.

name.ja: わざマシン - きしかいせい

description.en:
An all-out attack that becomes more
powerful the less HP the user has.
description.cn:
An all-out attack that becomes more
powerful the less HP the user has.
description.de:
Richtet mehr Schaden an, wenn eigene
KP niedrig sind.
description.fr:
Le lanceur ne retient plus ses
coups. Plus ses PV sont bas et plus
l'attaque est puissante.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca con tutte le sue
forze. Più i PS sono bassi,
maggiore è la potenza di questa
mossa.
description.es:
Ataque desesperado que causa más
daño cuantos menos PS tenga el
usuario.
description.ja:
ちからを　ふりしぼり　こうげきする。 じぶんの　ＨＰが　すくないほど
わざの　いりょくは　あがる。
description.tw:
An all-out attack that becomes more
powerful the less HP the user has.

name.ja: わざマシン - でんじほう

description.en:
The user fires an electric blast
like a cannon to inflict damage and
cause paralysis.
description.cn:
The user fires an electric blast
like a cannon to inflict damage and
cause paralysis.
description.de:
Kanonenähnlicher Elektro-Schuss, der
schadet und paralysiert.
description.fr:
Un boulet de canon électrifié qui
inflige des dégâts et paralyse
l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa provoca un'esplosione
elettrica che infligge danni e
paralizza il nemico.
description.es:
Dispara una descarga eléctrica que
causa daño y parálisis.
description.ja:
たいほうの　ような でんきを　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
あいてを　まひの　じょうたいに　する。
description.tw:
The user fires an electric blast
like a cannon to inflict damage and
cause paralysis.

name.ja: わざマシン - みきり

description.en:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.
description.cn:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.
description.de:
Anwender weicht jeder Attacke aus.
Scheitert eventuell bei Wiederholu
ng.
description.fr:
Le lanceur esquive toutes les
attaques. Plus la capacité est
utilisée de fois à la suite, plus
elle risque d'échouer.
description.it:
Permette di eludere tutti gli
attacchi. Se usata in successione
può fallire.
description.es:
Frena todos los ataques, pero puede
fallar si se usa repetidamente.
description.ja:
あいての　こうげきを まったく　うけない。 れんぞくで　だすと　しっぱ
い　しやすい。
description.tw:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name.ja: わざマシン - あまえる

description.en:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target's Attack is harshly
lowered.
description.cn:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target's Attack is harshly
lowered.
description.de:
Betört das Ziel und reduziert dessen
Angriff stark.
description.fr:
Le lanceur fait les yeux doux pour
berner l'ennemi et réduire
considérablement son Attaque.
description.it:
Ammalia il nemico con lo sguardo per
renderlo meno cauto. Ne riduce
molto l'Attacco.
description.es:
Engatusa al objetivo y reduce
bastante su Ataque.
description.ja:
かわいく　みつめて　ゆだんを　さそい あいての　こうげきを　がくっと　
さげる。
description.tw:
The user gazes at the target rather
charmingly, making it less wary.
The target's Attack is harshly
lowered.

name.ja: わざマシン - メガホーン

description.en:
Using its tough and impressive horn,
the user rams into the target with
no letup.
description.cn:
Using its tough and impressive horn,
the user rams into the target with
no letup.
description.de:
Brutaler Ramm-Angriff mit spitzem,
beeindruckendem Horn.
description.fr:
Le lanceur utilise ses gigantesques
cornes pour charger l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa utilizza il suo robusto e
imponente corno per colpire il
nemico con tutto se stesso.
description.es:
Violenta embestida con cuernos
imponentes.
description.ja:
かたくて　りっぱな　つので　おもいっきり あいてを　つきさして　こうげ
きする。
description.tw:
Using its tough and impressive horn,
the user rams into the target with
no letup.

name.ja: わざマシン - りゅうのいぶき

description.en:
The user exhales a mighty gust that
inflicts damage. It may also leave
the target with paralysis.
description.cn:
The user exhales a mighty gust that
inflicts damage. It may also leave
the target with paralysis.
description.de:
Fegt das Ziel mit zerstörerisch
heißem Atem weg. Paralysiert das
Ziel eventuell.
description.fr:
Le lanceur souffle fort sur l'ennemi
pour infliger des dégâts. Peut
aussi le paralyser.
description.it:
Investe il nemico con una raffica
potentissima che arreca danni. Può
anche paralizzarlo.
description.es:
Poderosa ráfaga de aliento que
golpea al objetivo y puede
paralizarlo.
description.ja:
ものすごい　いきを あいてに　ふきつけて　こうげきする。
まひ　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
The user exhales a mighty gust that
inflicts damage. It may also leave
the target with paralysis.

name.ja: わざマシン - バトンタッチ

description.en:
The user switches places with a
Pokémon in your party, passing
along some effects. Will not pass
stat changes or status ailments.
description.cn:
自身和队伍中另外一只Pokémon替换上场, 并可能传递某些特效.
不会传递能力阶级和状态变化.
description.de:
Der Benutzer tauscht den Platz mit
einem Pokémon in deiner Gruppe und
gibt einige Effekte weiter. Er
überträgt keine Wertänderungen oder
Statuskrankheiten.
description.fr:
Le lanceur change sa place avec un
Pokémon de votre équipe,
transmettant des effets. Ne
transmet pas les changements de
stats ou les changements de
statuts.
description.it:
L'utilizzatore cambia posto con un
Pokémon nella tua squadra,
passandogli alcuni effetti. Non
trasferisce cambi di statistiche o
stato.
description.es:
El usuario intercambia su lugar con
un Pokémon en tu equipo,
transfiriendo algunos efectos. No
transfiere cambios de característi
cas ni estados alterados.
description.ja:
The user switches places with a ポケモン
in your party, passing along some
effects.  Will not pass stat
changes or status ailments.
description.tw:
自身和隊伍中另外一隻Pokémon替換上場, 並可能傳遞某些特效.
不會傳遞能力階級和狀態變化.

name.ja: わざマシン - アンコール

description.en:
The user compels the target to keep
using only the move it last used
for three turns.
description.cn:
The user compels the target to keep
using only the move it last used
for three turns.
description.de:
Das Ziel wiederholt letzte Attacke
drei Runden lang.
description.fr:
Oblige l'ennemi à répéter la
dernière capacité utilisée durant 3
tours.
description.it:
Chi la usa obbliga per tre turni il
nemico a ripetere l'ultima mossa
eseguita.
description.es:
El objetivo repite su último
movimiento durante tres turnos.
description.ja:
あいてが　さいごに　つかった　わざを ３ターンの　あいだ
ずっと　ださせる。
description.tw:
The user compels the target to keep
using only the move it last used
for three turns.

name.ja: わざマシン - あまいかおり

description.en:
Expels a sweet scent which lowers
the foe's Evasion. It lures hordes
of Pokémon when used in areas which
have wild encounters, but requires
more PP.
description.cn:
用香气降低对手的闪避率. 在有野外分布的地方使用时可以吸引Pokémo
n群怪, 但会消耗更多PP.
description.de:
Versprüht einen süßen Duft, der die
Ausweichfähigkeit des Gegners
senkt. Er lockt Horden von Pokémon
an, wenn er in Gebieten mit wilden
Begegnungen eingesetzt wird,
erfordert aber mehr AP.
description.fr:
Diffuse un doux parfum qui réduit
l'évasion de l'adversaire. Attire
les hordes de Pokémon lorsque
utilisé dans les zones avec des
rencontres sauvages mais demande
plus de PP.
description.it:
Espelle un odore dolce che abbassa
l'Evasione dell'avversario. Attrae
orde di Pokémon quando usato in
zone di incontri selvatici, ma
richiede più PP.
description.es:
Expulsa un dulce aroma que baja la
evasión del objetivo. Atrae hordas
de Pokémon si se usa en áreas con
encuentros salvajes, pero utiliza
más PP.
description.ja:
Expels a sweet scent which lowers
the foe's Evasion.  It lures hordes
of ポケモン when used in tall grass,
but requires more PP.
description.tw:
用香氣降低對手的閃避率. 在有野外分佈的地方使用時可以吸引Pokémo
n群怪, 但會消耗更多PP.

name.ja: わざマシン - かみくだく

description.en:
Crunches the foe with its sharp
teeth. It may lower their Defense
stat.
description.cn: 用锋锐的牙齿咬住对手, 会降低对手防御.
description.de:
Zermalmt den Feind mit seinen
scharfen Zähnen. Das kann seinen
Verteidigungswert senken.
description.fr:
Broie l'ennemie avec des dents
aiguisées. Peut baisser sa
Défense.
description.it:
Morde l’avversario con i suoi denti
affilati. Può abbassare la sua
Difesa.
description.es:
Tritura al enemigo con sus dientes.
Puede bajar su Defensa.
description.ja:
Crunches the foe with its sharp
teeth. It may lower their Defense
stat.
description.tw: 用鋒銳的牙齒咬住對手, 會降低對手防禦.

name.ja: わざマシン - みらいよち

description.en:
Two turns after this move is used, a
hunk of psychic energy attacks the
target.
description.cn:
Two turns after this move is used, a
hunk of psychic energy attacks the
target.
description.de:
Zwei Runden, nachdem Seher
eingesetzt wurde, erfolgt der
Angriff.
description.fr:
De l'énergie psychique vient frapper
l'ennemi 2 tours après l'utilisati
on de cette capacité.
description.it:
Due turni dopo l'utilizzo di questa
mossa, il nemico viene attaccato
con energia psichica.
description.es:
Concentra energía psíquica para
golpear al objetivo dos turnos
después.
description.ja:
わざを　つかった　２ターン　あとに あいてに　ねんりきの
かたまりを　おくって　こうげきする。
description.tw:
Two turns after this move is used, a
hunk of psychic energy attacks the
target.

name.ja: わざマシン - ふくろだたき

description.en:
The user gets all party Pokémon to
attack the target. The more party
Pokémon, the greater the number of
attacks.
description.cn:
The user gets all party Pokémon to
attack the target. The more party
Pokémon, the greater the number of
attacks.
description.de:
Das gesamte Team nimmt aktiv am
Kampf teil. Je mehr Pokémon, desto
höher die Anzahl der Angriffe.
description.fr:
Le lanceur appelle tous les Pokémon
de son équipe à attaquer. Plus ils
sont nombreux, plus il y a
d'attaques.
description.it:
Chi la usa chiama in aiuto i Pokémon
della squadra: più ce ne sono,
maggiore è il numero di attacchi.
description.es:
Ataque de todo el equipo Pokémon.
Cuantos más haya, más veces ataca.
description.ja:
みかた　ぜんいんで　こうげきする。 なかまの　ポケモンが　おおいほど
わざの　こうげきかいすうが　ふえる。
description.tw:
The user gets all party Pokémon to
attack the target. The more party
Pokémon, the greater the number of
attacks.

name.ja: わざマシン - リベンジ

description.en:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the opponent in the same
turn.
description.cn:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the opponent in the same
turn.
description.de:
Schaden verdoppelt sich, wenn
Anwender in der Runde bereits
Schaden vom Ziel des Angriffes
genommen hat.
description.fr:
Une attaque deux fois plus puissante
si le lanceur a été blessé par
l'ennemi durant ce tour.
description.it:
Mossa d'attacco che infligge un
danno doppio se si è stati colpiti
dal nemico nello stesso turno.
description.es:
Ataque que produce el doble de daño
si el usuario es herido en el mismo
turno.
description.ja:
あいてから　わざを　うけていると その　あいてに　たいして
あたえる　ダメージが　２ばいに　なる。
description.tw:
An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been
hurt by the opponent in the same
turn.

name.ja: わざマシン - ふういん

description.en:
If the opponents know any move also
known by the user, the opponents
are prevented from using it.
description.cn:
If the opponents know any move also
known by the user, the opponents
are prevented from using it.
description.de:
Hindert Gegner am Einsatz von
Attacken, die der Anwender selbst
auch kennt.
description.fr:
Si l'ennemi et le lanceur ont des
capacités en commun, l'ennemi ne
pourra pas les utiliser.
description.it:
Chi la usa impedisce al nemico di
usare mosse che conoscono
entrambi.
description.es:
Impide a los contrincantes usar
ataques conocidos por el usuario
durante el combate.
description.ja:
あいてが　じぶんと　おなじ　わざを おぼえていたら　あいてだけ
そのわざを　つかえなく　する。
description.tw:
If the opponents know any move also
known by the user, the opponents
are prevented from using it.

name.ja: わざマシン - いやなおと

description.en:
An earsplitting screech harshly
reduces the target's Defense stat.
description.cn:
An earsplitting screech harshly
reduces the target's Defense stat.
description.de:
Stößt einen Schrei aus, um die
Verteidigung des Zieles stark zu
senken.
description.fr:
Cri strident qui baisse beaucoup la
Défense ennemie.
description.it:
Stridio assordante che riduce di
molto la Difesa del nemico.
description.es:
Alarido agudo que reduce mucho la
Defensa del objetivo.
description.ja:
おもわず　みみを　ふさぎたくなる いやなおとを　だして
あいての　ぼうぎょを　がくっと　さげる。
description.tw:
An earsplitting screech harshly
reduces the target's Defense stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - ブレイズキック

description.en:
The user launches a kick that lands
a critical hit more easily. It may
also leave the target with a burn.
description.cn:
The user launches a kick that lands
a critical hit more easily. It may
also leave the target with a burn.
description.de:
Starker Tritt mit hoher Volltreffer
quote. Verursacht eventuell
Verbrennung.
description.fr:
Le lanceur envoie un coup de pied au
taux de critiques élevé. Peut aussi
brûler la cible.
description.it:
Chi la usa tira un calcio. Probabile
brutto colpo. Può anche causare una
scottatura.
description.es:
Patada que suele ser un golpe
crítico y puede causar quemaduras.
description.ja:
こうげきした　あいてを やけど　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
きゅうしょにも　あたりやすい。
description.tw:
The user launches a kick that lands
a critical hit more easily. It may
also leave the target with a burn.

name.ja: わざマシン - ウェザーボール

description.en:
An attack move that varies in power
and type depending on the weather.
description.cn:
An attack move that varies in power
and type depending on the weather.
description.de:
Typ und Stärke der Attacke sind vom
Wetter zum Zeitpunkt der Anwendung
abhängig.
description.fr:
Une attaque dont la puissance et le
type varient en fonction du temps
qu'il fait.
description.it:
Mossa d'attacco che varia tipo e
forza in base alle condizioni
atmosferiche.
description.es:
El tipo y fuerza del ataque varían
según el tiempo que haga.
description.ja:
つかった　ときの　てんきに　よって わざの　タイプと　いりょくが　かわ
る。
description.tw:
An attack move that varies in power
and type depending on the weather.

name.ja: わざマシン - うそなき

description.en:
The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.
description.cn:
The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.
description.de:
Täuscht Weinen vor, um die
Spezial-Verteidigung des Zieles
stark zu senken.
description.fr:
Le lanceur fait semblant de pleurer
pour troubler l'ennemi et baisser
fortement sa Défense Spéciale.
description.it:
Chi la usa inscena un pianto
teatrale per commuovere il nemico.
Ne riduce di molto la Difesa
Speciale.
description.es:
Lágrimas de cocodrilo que bajan
mucho la Defensa Especial del
objetivo.
description.ja:
ないた　ふりをして　なみだを　ながす。 こまらせる　ことで
あいての　とくぼうを　がくっと　さげる。
description.tw:
The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - だくりゅう

description.en:
The user attacks by shooting muddy
water at the opposing team. It may
also lower the targets' accuracy.
description.cn:
The user attacks by shooting muddy
water at the opposing team. It may
also lower the targets' accuracy.
description.de:
Greift mit Matsch an und senkt
eventuell die Genauigkeit des
Gegners.
description.fr:
Le lanceur attaque en projetant de
l'eau boueuse. Peut aussi réduire
la Précision de l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca con un getto di
fango che può anche ridurre la
precisione dei nemici.
description.es:
Ataque con agua lodosa que puede
bajar la Precisión.
description.ja:
にごった　みずを あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
めいちゅうりつを　さげることが　ある。
description.tw:
The user attacks by shooting muddy
water at the opposing team. It may
also lower the targets' accuracy.

name.ja: わざマシン - リーフブレード

description.en:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a
sword and attacks by cutting its
target. Critical hits land more
easily.
description.cn:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a
sword and attacks by cutting its
target. Critical hits land more
easily.
description.de:
Hieb mit scharfkantigem Blatt. Hohe
Volltrefferquote.
description.fr:
Une feuille coupante comme une lame
entaille l'ennemi. Taux de
critiques élevé.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico usando una foglia
affilata come una spada. Probabile
brutto colpo.
description.es:
Acuchilla con una hoja fina. Suele
dar un golpe crítico.
description.ja:
はっぱを　つるぎのように　あやつり あいてを　きりつけて　こうげきする。
きゅうしょに　あたりやすい。
description.tw:
The user handles a sharp leaf like a
sword and attacks by cutting its
target. Critical hits land more
easily.

name.ja: わざマシン - りゅうのまい

description.en:
The user vigorously performs a
mystic, powerful dance that boosts
its Attack and Speed stats.
description.cn:
The user vigorously performs a
mystic, powerful dance that boosts
its Attack and Speed stats.
description.de:
Ein mystischer Tanz, der den
Angriffs- und Initiative-Wert
erhöht.
description.fr:
Une danse mystique dont le rythme
effréné augmente l'Attaque et la
Vitesse du lanceur.
description.it:
Danza mistica e vigorosa che aumenta
l'Attacco e la Velocità di chi la
usa.
description.es:
Danza mística que sube el Ataque y
la Velocidad.
description.ja:
しんぴてきで　ちからづよい　まいを はげしく　おどる。じぶんの
こうげきと　すばやさを　あげる。
description.tw:
The user vigorously performs a
mystic, powerful dance that boosts
its Attack and Speed stats.

name.ja: わざマシン - ロックブラスト

description.en:
The user hurls hard rocks at the
target. Two to five rocks are
launched in quick succession.
description.cn:
The user hurls hard rocks at the
target. Two to five rocks are
launched in quick succession.
description.de:
Wirft 2- bis 5-mal in Folge
Felsblöcke auf das Ziel.
description.fr:
Le lanceur projette un rocher sur
l'ennemi de 2 à 5 fois d'affilée.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con dei massi
pesanti lanciati in rapida
successione. Il numero di massi
varia da due a cinque.
description.es:
Lanza pedruscos al objetivo de dos a
cinco veces consecutivas.
description.ja:
かたい　がんせきを あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
２ー５かいの　あいだ　れんぞくで　だす。
description.tw:
The user hurls hard rocks at the
target. Two to five rocks are
launched in quick succession.

name.ja: わざマシン - インファイト

description.en:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. It also
cuts the user's Defense and Sp.
Def.
description.cn:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. It also
cuts the user's Defense and Sp.
Def.
description.de:
Nahkampf-Attacke ohne Rücksicht auf
Verluste. Senkt Verteidigung und
Spezial-Verteidigung des
Anwenders.
description.fr:
Le lanceur combat au corps à corps
sans se protéger. Baisse aussi sa
Défense et sa Défense Spéciale.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca abbassando la
guardia. La propria Difesa e la
Difesa Speciale si riducono.
description.es:
Lucha abiertamente contra el
objetivo sin protegerse. También
reduce la Defensa y la Defensa
Especial del usuario.
description.ja:
まもりを　すてて　あいての　ふところに とつげきする。じぶんの
ぼうぎょと　とくぼうが　さがる。
description.tw:
The user fights the target up close
without guarding itself. It also
cuts the user's Defense and Sp.
Def.

name.ja: わざマシン - ダメおし

description.en:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this
attack's power is doubled.
description.cn:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this
attack's power is doubled.
description.de:
Hat der Gegner während der Runde
bereits Schaden genommen, wird
Kraft der Attacke verdoppelt.
description.fr:
Cette attaque est deux fois plus
efficace si l'ennemi a déjà été
blessé durant ce tour.
description.it:
Se il nemico ha già subito dei danni
nello stesso turno, la potenza di
questa mossa raddoppia.
description.es:
Si el objetivo ya ha sufrido daño en
ese turno, la fuerza del ataque se
duplica.
description.ja:
そのターンに　あいてが すでに　ダメージを　うけて　いたら
わざの　いりょくは　２ばいに　なる。
description.tw:
If the target has already taken some
damage in the same turn, this
attack's power is doubled.

name.ja: わざマシン - パワースワップ

description.en:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Attack and
Sp. Atk with the target.
description.cn:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Attack and
Sp. Atk with the target.
description.de:
Psychische Kräfte tauschen
Änderungen an Angriff und
Spezial-Angriff mit denen des
Zieles.
description.fr:
Pouvoir qui échange les modificatio
ns de l'Attaque Spéciale et de
l'Attaque du lanceur avec la
cible.
description.it:
Chi la usa sfrutta la sua forza
psichica per scambiare le modifiche
ad Attacco e Attacco Speciale con
il bersaglio.
description.es:
El usuario emplea su poder mental
para intercambiar los cambios en
Ataque y Ataque Especial con el
objetivo.
description.ja:
ちょうのうりょくで　じぶんと　あいての こうげきと　とくこうの
のうりょく　へんかを　いれかえる。
description.tw:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Attack and
Sp. Atk with the target.

name.ja: わざマシン - ガードスワップ

description.en:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Defense
and Sp. Def with the target.
description.cn:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Defense
and Sp. Def with the target.
description.de:
Psychische Kräfte tauschen
Änderungen an Verteidigung und
Spezial-Verteidigung mit denen des
Zieles.
description.fr:
Pouvoir qui échange les modificatio
ns de la Défense Spéciale et de la
Défense avec la cible.
description.it:
Chi la usa sfrutta la sua forza
psichica per scambiare le modifiche
a Difesa e a Difesa Speciale con il
bersaglio.
description.es:
El usuario emplea su poder mental
para intercambiar los cambios en
Defensa y Defensa Especial con el
objetivo.
description.ja:
ちょうのうりょくで　じぶんと　あいての ぼうぎょと　とくぼうの
のうりょく　へんかを　いれかえる。
description.tw:
The user employs its psychic power
to switch changes to its Defense
and Sp. Def with the target.

name.ja: わざマシン - ネコにこばん

description.en:
Throws coins at the foe which are
recovered after the battle. The
amount of coins increases with the
foe's level. It's only effective
once per battle.
description.cn:
将战斗后能回收的钱币投向对手. 钱币的数目随对手的等级而增长.
每场战斗仅生效一次.
description.de:
Wirft Münzen auf den Feind, die nach
dem Kampf wieder eingesammelt
werden. Die Menge der Münzen steigt
mit der Stufe des Gegners. Sie ist
nur einmal pro Kampf wirksam.
description.fr:
Lance des pièces à l'adversaire qui
sont ramassées après le combat. Le
nombre de pièces dépend du niveau
de l'adversaire. N'agit qu'une fois
par combat.
description.it:
Lancia monete all'avversario che
saranno recuperate dopo la lotta.
L'ammontare di monete cresce con il
livello dell'avversario. Ha effetto
solo una volta per lotta.
description.es:
Tira monedas al enemigo que se
recogen después del combate. La
cantidad de monedas recogidas
aumenta con el nivel del enemigo.
Sólo funciona una vez por combate.
description.ja:
Throws coins at the foe which are
recovered after the battle. The
amount of coins increases with the
foe's level. It's only effective
once per battle.
description.tw:
將戰鬥後能回收的錢幣投向對手. 錢幣的數目隨對手的等級而增長.
每場戰鬥僅生效一次.

name.ja: わざマシン - どくびし

description.en:
The user lays a trap of poison
spikes at the opponent's feet. They
poison opponents that switch into
battle.
description.cn:
The user lays a trap of poison
spikes at the opponent's feet. They
poison opponents that switch into
battle.
description.de:
Anwender legt eine Falle mit
Giftdornen aus. Gegner, die in den
Kampf eingreifen, werden
vergiftet.
description.fr:
Lance des pics autour de l'ennemi.
Ils empoisonnent les ennemis qui
entrent au combat.
description.it:
Chi la usa piazza una trappola di
punte che avvelenano i nemici che
scendono in campo.
description.es:
Lanza una trampa de púas tóxicas a
los pies del objetivo. El veneno
afecta a los Pokémon que entran.
description.ja:
あいての　あしもとに　どくびしを しかける。こうたいで　でてきた　あい
ての ポケモンに　どくを　おわせる。
description.tw:
The user lays a trap of poison
spikes at the opponent's feet. They
poison opponents that switch into
battle.

name.ja: わざマシン - フレアドライブ

description.en:
The user cloaks itself in fire and
charges at the target. The user
sustains serious damage and may
leave the target burned.
description.cn:
The user cloaks itself in fire and
charges at the target. The user
sustains serious damage and may
leave the target burned.
description.de:
Anwender hüllt sich in Flammen und
stürmt auf das Ziel, das sich evtl.
verbrennt. Anwender nimmt selbst
großen Schaden.
description.fr:
Le lanceur s'embrase avant de
charger l'ennemi. Le choc blesse
aussi gravement le lanceur. Peut
brûler l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa si ricopre di fuoco e
carica il bersaglio, ma subisce il
contraccolpo. Può anche scottare.
description.es:
El Pokémon se cubre de llamas y
carga contra el objetivo, aunque él
también recibe daños.
description.ja:
ほのおを　まとって　とっしんする。 じぶんも　かなり　ダメージを　うけ
る。 やけど　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
The user cloaks itself in fire and
charges at the target. The user
sustains serious damage and may
leave the target burned.

name.ja: わざマシン - はどうだん

description.en:
The user looses a blast of aura
power from deep within its body at
the target. This move is certain to
hit.
description.cn:
The user looses a blast of aura
power from deep within its body at
the target. This move is certain to
hit.
description.de:
Tief aus dem Inneren des Anwenders
löst sich ein kraftvoller Stoß
Auraenergie. Trifft in jedem Fall.
description.fr:
Le lanceur dégage une aura et
projette de l'énergie. N'échoue
jamais.
description.it:
Chi la usa rilascia una forza eterea
dal profondo del corpo. La mossa è
infallibile.
description.es:
Libera una descarga de la fuerza del
aura desde su interior. Es
infalible.
description.ja:
からだの　おくから　はどうの　ちからを あいてに　うちはなつ。
こうげきは　かならず　めいちゅう　する。
description.tw:
The user looses a blast of aura
power from deep within its body at
the target. This move is certain to
hit.

name.ja: わざマシン - カウンター

description.en:
A retaliation move that counters any
physical attack, inflicting double
the damage taken.
description.cn:
A retaliation move that counters any
physical attack, inflicting double
the damage taken.
description.de:
Kontert physischen Treffer und fügt
dem Gegner das Doppelte des
Schadens zu, den der Anwender
erlitten hat.
description.fr:
Une riposte qui répond à toute
attaque physique en infligeant le
double de dégâts.
description.it:
Mossa che contrasta ogni attacco
fisico, arrecando il doppio del
danno ricevuto.
description.es:
Devuelve un golpe físico por
duplicado.
description.ja:
あいてから　うけた　ぶつり　こうげきの ダメージを　２ばいに　して
おなじ　あいてに　かえす。
description.tw:
A retaliation move that counters any
physical attack, inflicting double
the damage taken.

name.ja: わざマシン - ゆびをふる

description.en:
The user waggles a finger and
stimulates its brain into randomly
using nearly any move.
description.cn:
The user waggles a finger and
stimulates its brain into randomly
using nearly any move.
description.de:
Bewegt Finger, um das Gehirn zu
stimulieren. Wählt zufällig eine
Attacke aus.
description.fr:
Agite un doigt et stimule le cerveau
pour utiliser presque n'importe
quelle capacité au hasard.
description.it:
Chi la usa fa di no con un dito e
stimola il cervello a usare a caso
una delle tante mosse esistenti.
description.es:
El usuario mueve un dedo y estimula
su cerebro para usar al azar casi
cualquier movimiento.
description.ja:
ゆびをふり　じぶんの　のうを　しげきして すべての　わざの　なかから
どれか　１つを　くりだす。
description.tw:
The user waggles a finger and
stimulates its brain into randomly
using nearly any move.

name.ja: わざマシン - メガトンキック

description.en:
The target is attacked by a kick
launched with muscle-packed power.
description.cn:
The target is attacked by a kick
launched with muscle-packed power.
description.de:
Das Ziel wird mit einem extrem
heftigen Tritt angegriffen.
description.fr:
Un coup de pied superpuissant et
intense qui frappe l'ennemi.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con un calcio
sferrato con la forza di muscoli
poderosi.
description.es: Patada de extrema fuerza.
description.ja:
ものすごい　ちからを　こめた　キックで あいてを　けとばして　こうげき
する。
description.tw:
The target is attacked by a kick
launched with muscle-packed power.

name.ja: わざマシン - メガトンパンチ

description.en:
The target is slugged by a punch
thrown with muscle-packed power.
description.cn:
The target is slugged by a punch
thrown with muscle-packed power.
description.de: Ein unglaublich kräftiger Hieb.
description.fr:
L'ennemi reçoit un coup de poing
d'une puissance incroyable.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con un pugno
poderoso.
description.es: Un puñetazo de gran potencia.
description.ja: ちからを　こめた　パンチで あいてを　こうげきする。
description.tw:
The target is slugged by a punch
thrown with muscle-packed power.

name.ja: わざマシン - すてみタックル

description.en:
A reckless, life-risking tackle. It
also damages the user by a fairly
large amount, however.
description.cn:
A reckless, life-risking tackle. It
also damages the user by a fairly
large amount, however.
description.de:
Lebensgefährlicher Angriff, bei dem
sich der Angreifer selbst
verletzt.
description.fr:
Une dangereuse charge. Inflige aussi
des dégâts assez importants au
lanceur.
description.it:
Carica spietata e pericolosa che
danneggia molto anche chi la usa.
description.es:
Ataque arriesgado que también hiere
al agresor.
description.ja:
いのちを　かけて あいてに　とっしんして　こうげきする。
じぶんも　かなり　ダメージを　うける。
description.tw:
A reckless, life-risking tackle. It
also damages the user by a fairly
large amount, however.

name.ja: わざマシン - のしかかり

description.en:
The user drops onto the target with
its full body weight. It may also
leave the target with paralysis.
description.cn:
The user drops onto the target with
its full body weight. It may also
leave the target with paralysis.
description.de:
Trifft das Ziel mit vollem
Körpereinsatz. Bewirkt eventuell
Paralyse.
description.fr:
Le lanceur se laisse tomber sur
l'ennemi de tout son poids. Peut le
paralyser.
description.it:
Chi la usa carica il nemico con
tutto il corpo. Può causarne anche
la paralisi.
description.es:
Salta sobre el objetivo con todo su
peso. Puede paralizar.
description.ja:
からだ　ぜんたいで あいてに　のしかかり　こうげきする。
まひ　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
The user drops onto the target with
its full body weight. It may also
leave the target with paralysis.

name.ja: わざマシン - タマゴうみ

description.en:
Heals the user by half of its max
HP.
description.cn: 恢复自身最大HP量的一半.
description.de:
Heilt den Anwender um die Hälfte
seiner maximalen KP.
description.fr:
Soigne la moitié des PVs max du
lanceur.
description.it:
Cura all’utilizzatore metà dei suoi
PS massimi.
description.es:
Cura al usuario la mitad de sus PS
máximos.
description.ja:
Heals the user by half of its max
HP.
description.tw: 恢復自身最大HP量的一半.

name.ja: わざマシン - ばくれつパンチ

description.en:
The user punches the target with
full, concentrated power. It
confuses the target if it hits.
description.cn:
The user punches the target with
full, concentrated power. It
confuses the target if it hits.
description.de:
Kräftiger Schlag, der das Ziel bei
Erfolg verwirrt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur rassemble ses forces et
envoie un coup de poing à l'ennemi.
S'il est touché, il est confus.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con un pugno
davvero forte. Se va a segno, lo
confonde.
description.es:
Puñetazo con toda la fuerza
concentrada. Causa confusión si
atina.
description.ja:
こんしんの　ちからで パンチを　くりだして　こうげきする。
あいてを　かならず　こんらん　させる。
description.tw:
The user punches the target with
full, concentrated power. It
confuses the target if it hits.

name.ja: わざマシン - ものまね

description.en:
The user copies the target's last
move. The move can be used during
battle until the Pokémon is
switched out.
description.cn:
The user copies the target's last
move. The move can be used during
battle until the Pokémon is
switched out.
description.de:
Kopiert die zuvor ausgeführte
Attacke des Zieles. Kann im Kampf
bis zur Auswechslung verwendet
werden.
description.fr:
Le lanceur copie la dernière
capacité utilisée par la cible et
la conserve tant qu'il reste au
combat.
description.it:
Copia l'ultima mossa usata dal
bersaglio. La mossa copiata si può
utilizzare fino alla sostituzione
del Pokémon.
description.es:
Copia el último movimiento usado por
el objetivo. Dicho movimiento se
podrá usar mientras el Pokémon no
sea cambiado.
description.ja:
あいてが　さいごに　つかった　わざを せんとうの　あいだ
じぶんの　わざに　することが　できる。
description.tw:
The user copies the target's last
move. The move can be used during
battle until the Pokémon is
switched out.

name.ja: わざマシン - メタルクロー

description.en:
The target is raked with steel
claws. It may also raise the user's
Attack stat.
description.cn:
The target is raked with steel
claws. It may also raise the user's
Attack stat.
description.de:
Klauen-Attacke, die eventuell den
Angriffs-Wert des Anwenders
erhöht.
description.fr:
Attaque avec des griffes d'acier.
Peut aussi augmenter l'Attaque du
lanceur.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con artigli
d'acciaio. Può anche aumentare
l'Attacco di chi la usa.
description.es:
Ataque con garras de acero que puede
aumentar el Ataque del usuario.
description.ja:
こうてつの　ツメで　あいてを　きりさいて こうげきする。じぶんの　こう
げきが あがることが　ある。
description.tw:
The target is raked with steel
claws. It may also raise the user's
Attack stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - こごえるかぜ

description.en:
The user attacks with a gust of
chilled air. It also reduces the
targets' Speed stat.
description.cn:
The user attacks with a gust of
chilled air. It also reduces the
targets' Speed stat.
description.de:
Eis-Attacke, die dem Gegner Schaden
zufügt und seinen Initiative-Wert
senkt.
description.fr:
Une bourrasque de vent froid blesse
l'ennemi. Réduit aussi sa Vitesse.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca i nemici con una
folata di aria gelida e ne riduce
anche la Velocità.
description.es:
Ataque con aire helado que baja la
Velocidad del objetivo.
description.ja:
つめたい　れいきを あいてに　ふきつけて　こうげきする。
あいての　すばやさを　さげる。
description.tw:
The user attacks with a gust of
chilled air. It also reduces the
targets' Speed stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - エアカッター

description.en:
The user launches razor-like wind to
slash the opposing team. Critical
hits land more easily.
description.cn:
The user launches razor-like wind to
slash the opposing team. Critical
hits land more easily.
description.de:
Greift mit rasierklingenartigem Wind
an. Hohe Volltrefferquote.
description.fr:
Le lanceur appelle des vents
tranchants qui lacèrent l'ennemi.
Taux de critiques élevé.
description.it:
Chi la usa provoca un vento
tagliente che sferza i nemici.
Probabile brutto colpo.
description.es:
Viento cortante que azota. Suele ser
un golpe crítico.
description.ja:
するどい　かぜで あいてを　きりつけて　こうげきする。
きゅうしょに　あたりやすい。
description.tw:
The user launches razor-like wind to
slash the opposing team. Critical
hits land more easily.

name.ja: わざマシン - タネばくだん

description.en:
The user slams a barrage of
hard-shelled seeds down on the
target from above.
description.cn:
The user slams a barrage of
hard-shelled seeds down on the
target from above.
description.de:
Anwender lässt eine Menge Samen mit
harter Schale von oben auf das Ziel
fallen.
description.fr:
Le lanceur fait pleuvoir un déluge
de graines solides sur l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa emette una raffica di
semi dal guscio duro che colpiscono
il nemico dall'alto.
description.es:
Lanza al objetivo una descarga de
semillas explosivas desde arriba.
description.ja:
かたい　からを　もつ　おおきな　タネを うえから　たたきつけて
あいてを　こうげきする。
description.tw:
The user slams a barrage of
hard-shelled seeds down on the
target from above.

name.ja: わざマシン - ダストシュート

description.en:
The user shoots filthy garbage at
the target to attack. It may also
poison the target.
description.cn:
The user shoots filthy garbage at
the target to attack. It may also
poison the target.
description.de:
Anwender schießt mit Müll auf das
Ziel. Vergiftet dieses eventuell.
description.fr:
Le lanceur envoie des détritus sur
l'ennemi. Peut aussi l'empoisonne
r.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca il nemico con
rifiuti sudici che possono anche
avvelenarlo.
description.es:
Lanza contra el objetivo asquerosa
basura. Puede envenenar al
objetivo.
description.ja:
きたない　ゴミを あいてに　ぶつけて　こうげきする。
どく　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
The user shoots filthy garbage at
the target to attack. It may also
poison the target.

name.ja: わざマシン - てっぺき

description.en:
The user hardens its body's surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.
description.cn:
The user hardens its body's surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.
description.de:
Anwender stärkt den Körper, um den
Verteidigungs-Wert stark zu
erhöhen.
description.fr:
L'épiderme du lanceur devient dur
comme du fer, ce qui augmente
considérablement sa Défense.
description.it:
Il corpo di chi la usa si indurisce
come il ferro, facendone salire di
molto la Difesa.
description.es:
Fortalece el cuerpo como si fuera
hierro y sube mucho la Defensa.
description.ja:
ひふを　てつのように かたくする　ことで じぶんの　ぼうぎょを　ぐーん
と　あげる。
description.tw:
The user hardens its body's surface
like iron, sharply raising its
Defense stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - ドリルライナー

description.en:
The user crashes into its target
while rotating its body like a
drill. Critical hits land more
easily.
description.cn:
The user crashes into its target
while rotating its body like a
drill. Critical hits land more
easily.
description.de:
Anwender rammt das Ziel, während er
seinen Körper wie einen Bohrer
dreht. Hohe Volltrefferquote.
description.fr:
Le lanceur tourne sur lui-même comme
une perceuse et se jette sur
l'ennemi. Taux de critiques élevé.
description.it:
Chi la usa si scaglia sul bersaglio
ruotando su se stesso come un
trapano perforante. Probabile
brutto colpo.
description.es:
El usuario golpea usando su cuerpo
como un taladro. Suele ser
crítico.
description.ja:
ドリルのように　からだを　かいてん しながら　あいてに　たいあたりする。
きゅうしょに　あたりやすい。
description.tw:
The user crashes into its target
while rotating its body like a
drill. Critical hits land more
easily.

name.ja: わざマシン - トリック

description.en:
The user catches the target off
guard and swaps its held item with
its own.
description.cn:
The user catches the target off
guard and swaps its held item with
its own.
description.de:
Erwischt das Ziel auf dem falschen
Fuß. Gehaltene Items werden mit
Anwender getauscht.
description.fr:
Le lanceur prend la cible au
dépourvu et l'oblige à échanger son
objet contre le sien.
description.it:
Chi la usa coglie il bersaglio in
contropiede e l'obbliga a cambiare
il suo strumento con il proprio.
description.es:
Engaña al objetivo desprevenido e
intercambia objetos.
description.ja:
あいての　すきを　ついて じぶんと　あいての もちものを　こうかんす
る。
description.tw:
The user catches the target off
guard and swaps its held item with
its own.

name.ja: わざマシン - おいかぜ

description.en:
The user whips up a turbulent
whirlwind that ups the Speed of all
party Pokémon for four turns.
description.cn:
The user whips up a turbulent
whirlwind that ups the Speed of all
party Pokémon for four turns.
description.de:
Anwender erzeugt einen Wirbelwind,
der Initiative aller Pokémon im
Team für vier Runden steigert.
description.fr:
Génère une rafale de vent qui
augmente la Vitesse des Pokémon de
l'équipe pendant 4 tours.
description.it:
Chi la usa scatena un turbine che
aumenta la Velocità di tutti i
Pokémon della squadra per quattro
turni.
description.es:
Crea un fuerte remolino que aumenta
la Velocidad de los Pokémon de tu
equipo durante cuatro turnos.
description.ja:
はげしく　ふきあれる かぜのうずを　つくり　４ターンの　あいだ
みかた　ぜんいんの　すばやさを　あげる。
description.tw:
The user whips up a turbulent
whirlwind that ups the Speed of all
party Pokémon for four turns.

name.ja: わざマシン - ハイパーボイス

description.en:
The user lets loose a horribly
echoing shout with the power to
inflict damage.
description.cn:
The user lets loose a horribly
echoing shout with the power to
inflict damage.
description.de: Laute Attacke mit Schallwellen.
description.fr:
Le lanceur pousse un cri dont l'écho
terrifiant a le pouvoir d'infliger
des dégâts.
description.it:
Chi la usa lancia un urlo straziante
che danneggia i nemici.
description.es:
Grito desgarrador que inflige daño
al objetivo.
description.ja:
うるさく　ひびく　おおきな　しんどうを あいてに　あたえて　こうげきす
る。
description.tw:
The user lets loose a horribly
echoing shout with the power to
inflict damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - だいちのちから

description.en:
The user makes the ground under the
target erupt with power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.
description.cn:
The user makes the ground under the
target erupt with power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.
description.de:
Der Boden unter dem Ziel erzittert
durch die Kraft der Erde. Senkt
eventuell Spezial-Verteidigung.
description.fr:
Des éruptions volcaniques ont lieu
sous l'ennemi. Peut aussi baisser
la Défense Spéciale de l'ennemi.
description.it:
Dal terreno sotto il nemico si
sprigiona una forza devastante. Può
anche ridurne la Difesa Speciale.
description.es:
La tierra a los pies del objetivo
erupciona violentamente. Puede
disminuir la Defensa Especial del
objetivo.
description.ja:
あいての　あしもとへ　だいちの　ちからを ほうしゅつする。あいての　と
くぼうを さげることが　ある。
description.tw:
The user makes the ground under the
target erupt with power. It may
also lower the target's Sp. Def.

name.ja: わざマシン - げきりん

description.en:
The user rampages and attacks for
two to three turns. It then becomes
confused, however.
description.cn:
The user rampages and attacks for
two to three turns. It then becomes
confused, however.
description.de:
Attacke über 2 bis 3 Runden, die den
Angreifer verwirrt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur laisse éclater sa rage et
attaque pendant 2 à 3 tours avant
de céder à la confusion.
description.it:
Chi la usa sfoga la sua ira e
attacca il nemico per due o tre
turni prima di essere lasciato in
preda alla confusione.
description.es:
Ataca de dos a tres turnos y acaba
confundiendo al agresor.
description.ja:
２ー３ターンの　あいだ あばれまくって　こうげきする。
あばれた　あとは　こんらん　する。
description.tw:
The user rampages and attacks for
two to three turns. It then becomes
confused, however.

name.ja: わざマシン - りゅうせいぐん

description.en:
Comets are summoned down from the
sky onto the target. The attack's
recoil harshly reduces the user's
Sp. Atk stat.
description.cn:
Comets are summoned down from the
sky onto the target. The attack's
recoil harshly reduces the user's
Sp. Atk stat.
description.de:
Kometen werden heraufbeschworen. Der
Rückstoß reduziert den Spezial-
Angriff des Anwenders stark.
description.fr:
Le lanceur invoque des comètes. Le
contrecoup réduit fortement son
Attaque Spéciale.
description.it:
Attacca con meteore che cadono dal
cielo. Il contraccolpo fa calare di
molto l'Attacco Speciale di chi la
usa.
description.es:
Hace que grandes cometas caigan del
cielo. Baja mucho el Ataque
Especial de quien lo usa.
description.ja:
てんくうから　いんせきを　 あいてに　おとす。つかうと　はんどうで
じぶんの　とくこうが　がくっと　さがる。
description.tw:
Comets are summoned down from the
sky onto the target. The attack's
recoil harshly reduces the user's
Sp. Atk stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - しねんのずつき

description.en:
The user focuses its willpower to
its head and attacks the target. It
may also make the target flinch.
description.cn:
The user focuses its willpower to
its head and attacks the target. It
may also make the target flinch.
description.de:
Anwender konzentriert seinen Willen
und rammt das Ziel. Dieses schreckt
eventuell zurück.
description.fr:
Le lanceur concentre sa volonté et
donne un coup de tête. Peut aussi
apeurer l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa concentra la forza nella
testa e si lancia contro il nemico.
Può anche farlo tentennare.
description.es:
Concentra su energía psíquica en la
cabeza para golpear. Puede hacer
que el objetivo retroceda.
description.ja:
しねんの　ちからを ひたいに　あつめて　こうげきする。
あいてを　ひるませる　ことが　ある。
description.tw:
The user focuses its willpower to
its head and attacks the target. It
may also make the target flinch.

name.ja: わざマシン - てだすけ

description.en:
The user assists an ally by boosting
the power of its attack.
description.cn:
The user assists an ally by boosting
the power of its attack.
description.de:
Anwender steigert die Kraft eines
Angriffes eines Freundes.
description.fr:
Une capacité qui augmente la
puissance d'attaque de l'allié
pendant un tour.
description.it:
Mossa che aumenta la potenza
dell'attacco di un alleato.
description.es:
El usuario ayuda a un aliado
reforzando la potencia de su
ataque.
description.ja:
なかまを　たすける。 てだすけ　された　ポケモンの　わざの
いりょくは　いつもより　おおきく　なる。
description.tw:
The user assists an ally by boosting
the power of its attack.

name.ja: わざマシン - けたぐり

description.en:
A powerful low kick that makes the
target fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on heavier targets.
description.cn:
A powerful low kick that makes the
target fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on heavier targets.
description.de:
Tritt, der das Ziel umwirft. Je
schwerer das Ziel ist, desto mehr
Schaden fügt ihm die Attacke zu.
description.fr:
Un puissant coup de pied bas qui
fauche l'ennemi. Il est plus
efficace contre les ennemis
lourds.
description.it:
Un calcio basso e potente che fa
cadere il nemico. Danneggia
maggiormente i nemici più pesanti.
description.es:
Patada baja. Cuanto más pesa el
objetivo, más daño causa.
description.ja:
あしを　つよく　けり　あいてを ころばせて　こうげきする。あいてが
おもいほど　いりょくが　あがる。
description.tw:
A powerful low kick that makes the
target fall over. It inflicts
greater damage on heavier targets.

name.ja: わざマシン - じばく

description.en:
The user attacks everything around
it by causing an explosion. The
user faints upon using this move.
description.cn:
The user attacks everything around
it by causing an explosion. The
user faints upon using this move.
description.de:
Anwender sprengt sich, richtet
rundum Riesenschaden an und wird
dabei besiegt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur explose en blessant tous
les Pokémon autour de lui. Le
lanceur tombe K.O.
description.it:
Chi la usa esplode e infligge danni
agli altri Pokémon in campo, ma poi
va KO.
description.es:
El atacante explota y hiere a todos
a su alrededor. El usuario se
debilita de inmediato.
description.ja:
ばくはつを　おこして　じぶんの まわりに　いるものを　こうげきする。
つかった　あとに　ひんしに　なる。
description.tw:
The user attacks everything around
it by causing an explosion. The
user faints upon using this move.

name.ja: わざマシン - ばかぢから

description.en:
The user attacks the target with
great power. However, it also
lowers the user's Attack and
Defense.
description.cn:
The user attacks the target with
great power. However, it also
lowers the user's Attack and
Defense.
description.de:
Starke Attacke, die sowohl Angriff
als auch Verteidigung des Anwenders
senkt.
description.fr:
Une attaque puissante, mais qui
baisse l'Attaque et la Défense du
lanceur.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca il nemico con
grande forza, ma il suo Attacco e
la sua Difesa peggiorano.
description.es:
Ataque de gran potencia, pero que
reduce el Ataque y la Defensa del
agresor.
description.ja:
すごい　ちからを　はっきして あいてを　こうげきする。じぶんの
こうげきと　ぼうぎょが　さがる。
description.tw:
The user attacks the target with
great power. However, it also
lowers the user's Attack and
Defense.

name.ja: わざマシン - くろいきり

description.en:
The user creates a haze that
eliminates every stat change among
all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
description.cn:
The user creates a haze that
eliminates every stat change among
all the Pokémon engaged in battle.
description.de:
Erzeugt einen dunklen Nebel. Alle
Veränderungen der Statuswerte der
Kampfteilnehmer werden annulliert.
description.fr:
Un brouillard qui annule les
changements de stats de tous les
Pokémon au combat.
description.it:
Chi la usa crea una nube nera che
annulla ogni modifica delle
statistiche di tutti i Pokémon in
campo.
description.es:
Neblina que elimina los cambios de
características de todos los
Pokémon en combate.
description.ja:
くろいきりを　だして　せんとうに でている　ポケモン　ぜんいんの
のうりょく　へんかを　もとに　もどす。
description.tw:
The user creates a haze that
eliminates every stat change among
all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

name.ja: わざマシン - じゅうりょく

description.en:
Gravity is intensified for five
turns, making moves involving
flying unusable and negating
Levitate.
description.cn:
Gravity is intensified for five
turns, making moves involving
flying unusable and negating
Levitate.
description.de:
Die Gravitation wird für fünf Runden
erhöht. Macht Fliegen unmöglich und
verhindert Schwebe.
description.fr:
La gravité augmente pendant 5 tours,
ce qui empêche les capacités
volantes et annule Lévitation.
description.it:
Intensifica la gravità per cinque
turni. Le mosse che fanno volare e
Levitazione sono inutilizzabili.
description.es:
La gravedad aumenta durante cinco
turnos, lo que impide acciones que
impliquen volar o levitar.
description.ja:
５ターンの　あいだ じゅうりょくを　つよくして　ふゆうや
そらへ　とぶ　わざを　つかえなく　する。
description.tw:
Gravity is intensified for five
turns, making moves involving
flying unusable and negating
Levitate.

name.ja: わざマシン - はたきおとす

description.en:
The user slaps down the target's
held item, preventing that item
from being used in the battle.
description.cn:
The user slaps down the target's
held item, preventing that item
from being used in the battle.
description.de:
Schlägt das Item des Zieles weg und
vereitelt so dessen Gebrauch
während des Kampfes.
description.fr:
Le lanceur fait tomber l'objet tenu
par l'ennemi pour le rendre
inutilisable durant le combat.
description.it:
Attacco che blocca anche lo
strumento tenuto dal nemico,
impedendone l'uso nella lotta.
description.es:
Impide al objetivo usar el objeto
que lleva durante el combate.
description.ja:
あいての　もちものを　はたき　おとして せんとうが　おわるまで
つかえなく　する。
description.tw:
The user slaps down the target's
held item, preventing that item
from being used in the battle.

name.ja: わざマシン - むしくい

description.en:
The user bites the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.
description.cn:
The user bites the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.
description.de:
Anwender beißt das Ziel. Hält dieses
eine Beere, isst der Anwender sie
und erhält ihren Effekt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur pique l'ennemi. Si ce
dernier tient une Baie, le lanceur
la dévore et obtient son effet.
description.it:
Chi la usa morde il nemico. Inoltre,
se questi tiene una Bacca, gliela
ruba e ne sfrutta gli effetti.
description.es:
Pica al objetivo. Si el objetivo
lleva una Baya, el usuario se la
come y se beneficia de su efecto.
description.ja:
かみついて　こうげきする。 あいてが　きのみを　もっている　とき
たべて　きのみの　こうかを　うけられる。
description.tw:
The user bites the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.

name.ja: わざマシン - いかりのまえば

description.en:
The user chomps hard on the target
with its sharp front fangs. It cuts
the target's HP to half.
description.cn:
The user chomps hard on the target
with its sharp front fangs. It cuts
the target's HP to half.
description.de:
Greift mit scharfen Reißzähnen an.
KP des Zieles werden halbiert.
description.fr:
Une vilaine morsure d'incisives qui
réduit de moitié les PV de
l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa salta sul nemico
azzannandolo con i suoi incisivi
affilati e facendogli perdere metà
dei PS.
description.es:
Finos colmillos que reducen a la
mitad los PS del objetivo.
description.ja:
するどい　まえばで はげしく　かみついて　こうげきする。
あいての　ＨＰは　はんぶんに　なる。
description.tw:
The user chomps hard on the target
with its sharp front fangs. It cuts
the target's HP to half.

name.ja: わざマシン - しんくうは

description.en:
The user whirls its fists to send a
wave of pure vacuum at the target.
This move always goes first.
description.cn:
The user whirls its fists to send a
wave of pure vacuum at the target.
This move always goes first.
description.de:
Ein Faustwirbel sendet eine
Vakuumwelle auf das Ziel.
Erstschlaggarantie.
description.fr:
Le lanceur agite son poing pour
projeter une onde de vide. Frappe
toujours en premier.
description.it:
Chi la usa rotea i pugni per
lanciare un'onda di vuoto assoluto
verso il nemico. Attacca per
primo.
description.es:
Gira los puños y libera una onda de
vacío contra el objetivo. Este
movimiento siempre va primero.
description.ja:
こぶしを　ふって しんくうの　なみを　まきおこす。
かならず　せんせい　こうげき　できる。
description.tw:
The user whirls its fists to send a
wave of pure vacuum at the target.
This move always goes first.

name.ja: わざマシン - さわぐ

description.en:
The user attacks in an uproar for
three turns. Over that time, no one
can fall asleep.
description.cn:
The user attacks in an uproar for
three turns. Over that time, no one
can fall asleep.
description.de:
Anwender greift an, indem er über
drei Runden hinweg einen Aufruhr
erzeugt. Verhindert Schlaf.
description.fr:
Le lanceur attaque en rugissant
durant 3 tours. Pendant ce temps,
personne ne peut s'endormir.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca per tre turni con
un frastuono che non fa dormire
nessuno.
description.es:
Ataca de forma alborotada durante
tres turnos. Mantiene despiertos a
todos.
description.ja:
３ターンの　あいだ さわいで　あいてを　こうげきする。
そのあいだは　だれも　ねむれなく　なる。
description.tw:
The user attacks in an uproar for
three turns. Over that time, no one
can fall asleep.

name.ja: わざマシン - がむしゃら

description.en:
An attack move that cuts down the
target's HP to equal the user's
HP.
description.cn:
An attack move that cuts down the
target's HP to equal the user's
HP.
description.de:
Trifft nur, wenn KP des Anwenders
geringer als KP des Zieles sind.
Senkt dessen KP auf Niveau der KP
des Anwenders.
description.fr:
Une attaque qui réduit les PV de
l'ennemi au niveau des PV du
lanceur.
description.it:
Attacco che riduce i PS del nemico a
una quantità pari ai PS di chi la
usa.
description.es:
Reduce los PS del objetivo para que
igualen a los del atacante.
description.ja:
あいての　ＨＰが　じぶんの　ＨＰと おなじ　くらいに　なるように
ダメージを　あたえる。
description.tw:
An attack move that cuts down the
target's HP to equal the user's
HP.

name.ja: わざマシン - いたみわけ

description.en:
The user adds its HP to the target's
HP, then equally shares the
combined HP with the target.
description.cn:
The user adds its HP to the target's
HP, then equally shares the
combined HP with the target.
description.de:
Addiert KP von Anwender und Ziel.
Teilt sie gerecht auf.
description.fr:
Le lanceur ajoute ses PV à ceux de
sa cible et les répartit
équitablement.
description.it:
Chi la usa somma i propri PS a
quelli di un altro Pokémon per poi
dividerli in parti uguali.
description.es:
Suma los PS del usuario a los del
objetivo y los reparte a partes
iguales.
description.ja:
じぶんの　ＨＰと　あいての　ＨＰを あわせて　それを　じぶんと　あいてで
なかよく　わける。
description.tw:
The user adds its HP to the target's
HP, then equally shares the
combined HP with the target.

name.ja: わざマシン - フェザーダンス

description.en:
The user covers the target's body
with a mass of down that harshly
lowers its Attack stat.
description.cn:
The user covers the target's body
with a mass of down that harshly
lowers its Attack stat.
description.de:
Hüllt das Ziel in Daunen und senkt
dessen Angriffs-Wert stark.
description.fr:
Une montagne de plumes ensevelit
l'ennemi et réduit considérablement
son Attaque.
description.it:
Chi la usa copre il nemico con un
manto di piume che riduce di molto
il suo Attacco.
description.es:
Envuelve al objetivo con un manto de
plumas para reducir mucho su
Ataque.
description.ja:
うもうを　ふりまいて あいての　からだに　からませる。
あいての　こうげきを　がくっと　さげる。
description.tw:
The user covers the target's body
with a mass of down that harshly
lowers its Attack stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - エレキネット

description.en:
The user captures and attacks
opposing Pokémon by using an
electric net. It reduces the
targets' Speed stat.
description.cn:
The user captures and attacks
opposing Pokémon by using an
electric net. It reduces the
targets' Speed stat.
description.de:
Fängt Ziele mit einem elektrischen
Netz und senkt deren Initiative.
description.fr:
Attrape l'ennemi dans un filet
électrique. Baisse aussi la Vitesse
de l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca i nemici
catturandoli con una ragnatela
elettrica e riducendone la
Velocità.
description.es:
Atrapa y ataca a los objetivos con
una telaraña eléctrica. También
reduce su Velocidad.
description.ja:
でんきの　ネットで あいてを　つかまえて　こうげきする。
あいての　すばやさを　さげる。
description.tw:
The user captures and attacks
opposing Pokémon by using an
electric net. It reduces the
targets' Speed stat.

A cosmetic item which can be used to
modify your appearance.
description.cn: 改变角色外貌的道具.
description.de:
Ein kosmetischer Gegenstand, das zur
Veränderung deines Aussehens benutzt
werden kann.
description.fr:
Un objet cosmétique qui peut être
utilisé pour modifier votre
apparence.
description.it:
Un cosmetico che può essere usato per
modificare il tuo aspetto.
description.es:
Un objeto cosmético que puede
utilizarse para cambiar tu
apariencia.

A cosmetic item which can be used to
modify your appearance.

description.en:
An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.
description.cn:
An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.
description.de:
Ein Ball mit hoher Erfolgsquote.
Dem Superball in allen
Punkten überlegen.
description.fr:
Une Ball ultraperformante dont le
taux
de réussite est supérieur à celui de
la
Super Ball.
description.it:
Ball dalle prestazioni eccellenti:
fornisce maggiori probabilità di
cattura rispetto alla Mega Ball.
description.es:
Poké Ball de rendimiento superior.
Tiene un índice de éxito mayor
al de la Superball.
description.ja:
スーパーボールよりも　さらに
ポケモンを　つかまえやすくなった
すごく　せいのうのいい　ボール。
description.tw:
An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.

description.en:
A good, high-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a standard Poké Ball.
description.cn:
A good, high-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a standard Poké Ball.
description.de:
Ein Ball mit guter Erfolgsquote.
Dem Pokéball in allen
Punkten überlegen.
description.fr:
Une Ball très performante dont le
taux
de réussite est supérieur à celui de
la
Poké Ball.
description.it:
Ball dalle ottime prestazioni:
fornisce
maggiori probabilità di cattura
rispetto
alla Poké Ball.
description.es:
Poké Ball de alto rendimiento.
Tiene un índice de éxito superior
al de la Poké Ball.
description.ja:
モンスターボールよりも　さらに
ポケモンを　つかまえやすくなった
すこし　せいのうのいい　ボール。
description.tw:
A good, high-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a standard Poké Ball.

description.en:
A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the
target.
It is designed as a capsule system.
description.cn:
A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the
target.
It is designed as a capsule system.
description.de:
Damit fängst du wilde Pokémon.
Du wirfst ihn wie einen normalen
Ball.
Das Design ähnelt dem einer Kapsel.
description.fr:
Un objet pareil à une capsule, qui
capture les Pokémon sauvages. Il
suffit
pour cela de le jeter comme une
balle.
description.it:
Strumento dotato di capsula usato per
catturare Pokémon selvatici. Si
lancia
contro il bersaglio come una palla.
description.es:
Dispositivo con diseño capsular que
atrapa Pokémon salvajes. Se lanza
como una bola contra el blanco.
description.ja:
やせいの　ポケモンに　なげて
つかまえる　ための　ボール。
カプセルしきに　なっている。
description.tw:
A device for catching wild Pokémon.
It is thrown like a ball at the
target.
It is designed as a capsule system.

description.en:
A somewhat different Poké Ball which
works especially well on Water and
Bug-type Pokémon. It's not affected
by moves which change a Pokémon's
typing.
description.cn:
一种对水和虫属性Pokémon有奇效的Poké Ball.
不受会改变Pokémon属性的技能的影响.
description.de:
Ein etwas anderer Pokéball, der
besonders gut bei Wasser- und
Käfer-Typen Pokémon funktioniert. Er
wird nicht von Attacken beeinflusst,
die den Typ eines Pokémon ändern.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball un peu différente qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien sur
les Pokémon de type Eau et Insecte.
Elle n'est pas affectée par les
attaques qui modifient le type d'un
Pokémon.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball leggermente diversa che
funziona particolarmente bene sui
Pokémon di tipo Acqua e Coleottero.
Non è influenzata da attacchi che
modificano il tipo di un Pokémon.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball algo diferente que
funciona especialmente bien en
Pokémon tipo Agua y Bicho. No es
afectada por movimientos que cambian
el tipo de un Pokémon.
description.ja:
A somewhat different Poké Ball which
works especially well on Water and
Bug-type ポケモン. It's not affected by
moves which change a ポケモン's typing.
description.tw:
一種對水和蟲屬性Pokémon有奇效的Poké Ball.
不受會改變Pokémon屬性的技能的影響.

description.en:
A somewhat different Poké Ball which
works especially well on Pokémon that
are encountered in water.
description.cn: 有点与众不同的Poké Ball. 能很容易地捕捉水中的Pokémon.
description.de:
Ein etwas anderes Pokéball, das
besonders gut bei Pokémon
funktioniert, die im Wasser
angetroffen werden.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball un peu différente qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien sur
les Pokémon que l'on rencontre dans
l'eau.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball un po diversa che
funziona particolarmente bene sui
Pokémon incontrati in acqua.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball algo diferente que
funciona especialmente bien en
Pokémon encontrados en el agua.
description.ja:
A somewhat different Poké Ball which
works especially well on ポケモン that
are encountered in water.
description.tw: 有點與眾不同的Poké Ball. 能很容易地捕捉水中的Pokémon.

description.en:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on weaker
Pokémon in the wild.
description.cn:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on weaker
Pokémon in the wild.
description.de:
Ein Ball, dessen Erfolgsquote
besonders bei schwächeren
Pokémon sehr hoch ist.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien
sur les Pokémon les plus faibles.
description.it:
Poké Ball un po' diversa. Risulta
particolarmente efficace sui Pokémon
selvatici più deboli.
description.es:
Es algo distinta a las demás.
Funciona
especialmente bien con los Pokémon
salvajes de nivel bajo.
description.ja:
つかまえる　やせいの　ポケモンが
よわいほど　つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。
description.tw:
A somewhat different Poké Ball that
works especially well on weaker
Pokémon in the wild.

description.en:
A Poké Ball which grows in strength
every consecutive capture of a
species of Pokémon. It powers up even
when using a different type of Poké
Ball. Its power is reset to 1.0x if
you capture something else, or if you
don't capture anything for a few
days.
description.cn:
连续捕获同种族的Pokémon时能不断提升捕获率的Poké Ball.
即便用别的类型的Poké Ball也能提升. 如果捕获了另一种族或者几天
内没有捕获, 捕获率重置为 x1.0
description.de:
Ein Pokéball, der mit jedem
aufeinanderfolgenden Fang einer Art
von Pokémon stärker wird. Er wird
auch dann stärker, wenn du eine
andere Art von Pokéball verwendest.
Seine Stärke wird auf 1,0x
zurückgesetzt, wenn du etwas anderes
fängst oder wenn du einige Tage lang
nichts fängst.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball dont la puissance
augmente à chaque capture consécutive
d'une espèce de Pokémon. Sa puissance
augmente même si vous utilisez un
autre type de Poké Ball. Sa puissance
est ramenée à 1,0x si vous capturez
quelque chose d'autre, ou si vous ne
capturez rien pendant quelques
jours.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball la cui potenza aumenta a
seconda delle catture consecutive di
una specie di Pokémon. Aumenta la
potenza anche se utilizzi un altro
tipo di Poké Ball. Torna ad avere
efficacia 1x se catturi un'altra
specie, o se non catturi nulla per
alcuni giorni.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball cuya fuerza aumenta en
función de las capturas consecutivas
de una especie de Pokémon. Aumenta su
poder incluso aunque se utilice otro
tipo de Poké Ball. Su poder vuelve a
x1 si capturas otra especie, o no
capturas nada durante unos días.
description.ja:
A モンスターボール which grows in strength
every consecutive capture of a
species of ポケモン. It powers up even
when using a different type of
モンスターボール. Its power is reset to 1.0x
if you capture something else, or if
you don't capture anything for a few
days.
description.tw:
連續捕獲同種族的Pokémon時能不斷提升捕獲率的Poké Ball.
即便用別的型別的Poké Ball也能提升. 如果捕獲了另一種族或者幾天
內沒有捕獲, 捕獲率重置為 x1.0

description.en:
A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.
description.cn:
A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.
description.de:
Ein Ball, der mit zunehmender
Kampfdauer effektiver wird.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne de mieux en mieux à
mesure que le combat s'éternise.
description.it:
Poké Ball un po' diversa che diventa
progressivamente più efficace con
l'aumentare dei turni in lotta.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball algo distinta que va
mejorando su rendimiento con cada
turno de combate.
description.ja:
ターンすうが　かかれば　かかるほど
ポケモンが　つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。
description.tw:
A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

description.en:
A luxurious Poké Ball which helps grow
your friendship with a Pokémon
quickly. It works well on Pokémon
which evolve due to happiness.
description.cn:
能快速提升与Pokémon亲密度的舒适宜居的Poké Ball.
对依靠亲密度进化的Pokémon作用显著.
description.de:
Ein luxuriöser Pokéball, das dazu
beiträgt, dass deine Freundschaft mit
einem Pokémon schnell wächst. Es
funktioniert gut bei Pokémon, die
sich aufgrund von Glück entwickeln.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball de luxe qui permet de
développer rapidement votre amitié
avec un Pokémon. Elle fonctionne bien
sur les Pokémon qui évoluent grâce au
bonheur.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball lussuosa che aiuta a
aumentare la tua amicizia con un
Pokémon velocemente. Funziona bene
con Pokémon che evolvono tramite
felicità.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball lujosa que ayuda a
crecer la amistad con un Pokémon
rápidamente. Funciona bien con
Pokémon que evolucionan por
felicidad.
description.ja:
A luxurious モンスターボール which helps grow
your friendship with a ポケモン quickly.
It works well on ポケモン which evolve
due to happiness.
description.tw:
