Il semble provenir d'un outil très
ancien.
description.it:
Un piccolo coccio giallo che con ogni
probabilità è un frammento di un
antico
strumento.
description.es:
Un pequeño fragmento amarillo.
Parece formar parte de algún tipo
de herramienta antigua.
description.ja:
きいろい　ちいさな　かけら。
むかしに　つくられた　なにかの
どうぐの　いちぶ　らしい。
description.tw:
A small yellow shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

description.en:
A small green shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.
description.cn:
A small green shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.
description.de:
Eine grüne Scherbe eines antiken
Werkzeugs, das vor langer Zeit
angefertigt wurde.
description.fr:
Petit tesson vert.
Il semble provenir d'un outil très
ancien.
description.it:
Un piccolo coccio verde che con ogni
probabilità è un frammento di un
antico
strumento.
description.es:
Un pequeño fragmento verde.
Parece formar parte de algún tipo
de herramienta antigua.
description.ja:
みどりの　ちいさな　かけら。
むかしに　つくられた　なにかの
どうぐの　いちぶ　らしい。
description.tw:
A small green shard.
It appears to be from some sort of
implement made long ago.

description.en:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps
after its use.
description.cn:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps
after its use.
description.de:
Hält 200 Schritte lang schwache,
wilde Pokémon ab.
description.fr:
Repousse les Pokémon sauvages
faibles pendant 200 pas.
description.it:
Repellente che evita l'incontro con i
Pokémon selvatici deboli per 200
passi
dopo l'utilizzo.
description.es:
Repele Pokémon salvajes débiles
en un recorrido de 200 pasos.
description.ja:
２００ぽ　すすむ　あいだ
よわい　やせいの　ポケモンが
まったく　でて　こなくなる。
description.tw:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 200 steps
after its use.

description.en:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps
after its use.
description.cn:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps
after its use.
description.de:
Hält 250 Schritte lang schwache,
wilde Pokémon ab.
description.fr:
Repousse les Pokémon sauvages
faibles pendant 250 pas.
description.it:
Repellente che evita l'incontro con i
Pokémon selvatici deboli per 250
passi
dopo l'utilizzo.
description.es:
Repele Pokémon salvajes débiles
en un recorrido de 250 pasos.
description.ja:
２５０ぽ　すすむ　あいだ
よわい　やせいの　ポケモンが
まったく　でて　こなくなる。
description.tw:
An item that prevents weak wild
Pokémon from appearing for 250 steps
after its use.

description.en:
A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a
cave
or a dungeon.
description.cn:
A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a
cave
or a dungeon.
description.de:
Ein langes, festes Seil, das die
sofortige Flucht aus Höhlen oder
Ähnlichem ermöglicht.
description.fr:
Une corde longue et solide permettant
de sortir rapidement d'une grotte ou
d'un donjon.
description.it:
Corda lunga e resistente che si usa
per fuggire in un batter d'occhio
dalle grotte o da certi luoghi
chiusi.
description.es:
Cuerda larga y resistente que sirve
para huir de cuevas y sitios cerrados
en general.
description.ja:
ながくて　じょうぶな　ヒモ。
どうくつや　ダンジョンから
ぬけだすことが　できる。
description.tw:
A long, durable rope.
Use it to escape instantly from a
cave
or a dungeon.

description.en:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as red as the sun.
description.cn:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as red as the sun.
description.de:
Dieser spezielle Stein löst bei
bestimmten Pokémon die Entwicklung
aus. Er ist rot wie die Sonne.
description.fr:
Une pierre étrange qui fait évoluer
certaines espèces de Pokémon.
Elle est rouge comme le soleil.
description.it:
Pietra particolare che fa evolvere
determinate specie di Pokémon.
È rossa come il sole.
description.es:
Curiosa piedra que hace evolucionar
a determinadas especies de Pokémon.
Es roja como el núcleo del sol.
description.ja:
ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　いし。
たいようのように　あかい。
description.tw:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as red as the sun.

Elle est noire comme la nuit.

determinate specie di Pokémon.
È nera come il cielo di notte.
description.es:
Curiosa piedra que hace evolucionar

Es negra como el azabache.
description.ja:
ある　とくていの　ポケモンを

よぞらのように　くろい。

Riporta l'immagine di un fulmine.
description.es:
Curiosa piedra que hace evolucionar

Tiene grabado un rayo.
description.ja:
ある　とくていの　ポケモンを

いなずまの　もようが　ある。

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.

species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

Elle est de couleur bleue.

species of Pokémon evolve.
It has a leaf pattern.

certaines espèces de Pokémon.
Une feuille est dessinée dessus.
description.it:
Pietra particolare che fa evolvere
determinate specie di Pokémon.
Riporta l'immagine di una foglia.
description.es:
Curiosa piedra que hace evolucionar
a determinadas especies de Pokémon.
Tiene grabada una hoja.
description.ja:
ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　いし。

description.en:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is sought after by collectors.
description.cn:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is sought after by collectors.
description.de:
Ein kleiner und seltener Pilz.
Seine Fans sind ganz aus dem
Häuschen, wenn sie einen finden.
description.fr:
Un petit champignon plutôt rare.
Il est plutôt populaire parmi
certains fans dévoués.
description.it:
Fungo piccolo e raro. È parecchio
apprezzato da alcuni intenditori.
description.es:
Una pequeña seta que es poco común
y bastante popular entre determinados
grupos de gourmets.
description.ja:
ちいさな　めずらしい　キノコ。
いちぶの　マニアの　あいだでは
けっこう　にんきが　たかい。
description.tw:
A small and rare mushroom.
It is sought after by collectors.

description.en:
A large and rare mushroom.
It is sought after by collectors.
description.cn:
A large and rare mushroom.
It is sought after by collectors.
description.de:
Ein großer und seltener Pilz.
Liebhaber
dieses Pilzes freuen sich ein Loch in
den Bauch, wenn sie einen finden.
description.fr:
Un grand champignon plutôt rare.
Il est très populaire parmi
certains fans dévoués.
description.it:
Fungo grande e raro. È molto
apprezzato da alcuni intenditori.
description.es:
Una gran seta que es poco común
y muy popular entre determinados
grupos de gourmets.
description.ja:
おおきな　めずらしい　キノコ。
いちぶの　マニアの　あいだでは
とても　にんきが　たかい。
description.tw:
A large and rare mushroom.
It is sought after by collectors.

description.en:
A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.
description.cn:
A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.
description.de:
Eine relativ kleine Perle, die in
schönem Silber funkelt. Sie ist
von geringem Wert.
description.fr:
Une petite perle qui brille d'une
jolie
couleur argent. Peut être vendue
à bas prix aux magasins.
description.it:
Perla piuttosto piccola dai graziosi
riflessi argentei. Si può vendere
a un prezzo piuttosto basso nei
negozi.
description.es:
Brillante perla pequeña y plateada
que no alcanza un buen precio en
las tiendas.
description.ja:
きれいな　ぎんいろに　ひかる
すこし　ちいさめの　しんじゅ。
ショップで　やすく　うれる。
description.tw:
A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles
in a pretty silver color.
It can be sold cheaply to shops.

description.en:
A quite-large pearl that sparkles in
a
pretty silver color. It can be sold
at
a high price to shops.
description.cn:
A quite-large pearl that sparkles in
a
pretty silver color. It can be sold
at
a high price to shops.
description.de:
Eine relativ große Perle, die in
schönem Silber funkelt. Sie ist
von hohem Wert.
description.fr:
Une grande perle qui brille d'une
jolie
couleur argent. Peut être vendue à
bon prix aux magasins.
description.it:
Perla piuttosto grande dai graziosi
riflessi argentei. Si può vendere
a un prezzo piuttosto alto nei
negozi.
description.es:
Brillante perla plateada de gran
tamaño que puede venderse
a buen precio en las tiendas.
description.ja:
きれいな　ぎんいろに　ひかる
かなり　おおつぶの　しんじゅ。
ショップで　たかく　うれる。
description.tw:
A quite-large pearl that sparkles in
a
pretty silver color. It can be sold
at
a high price to shops.

description.en:
Lovely, red-colored sand with a
loose,
silky feel. It can be sold at a high
price to shops.
description.cn:
Lovely, red-colored sand with a
loose,
silky feel. It can be sold at a high
price to shops.
description.de:
Schöner, roter Sand, der sich
seidenweich anfühlt. Er ist von
hohem Wert.
description.fr:
Sable rouge ravissant, aux grains
très
fins. Peut être vendu à bon prix aux
magasins.
description.it:
Bella sabbia rossa dalla consistenza
leggera e farinosa. Si può vendere
a un prezzo piuttosto alto nei
negozi.
description.es:
Bonita arena roja de tacto sedoso que
alcanza un alto precio en las
tiendas.
description.ja:
てざわりが　サラサラの
あかくて　きれいな　すな。
ショップで　たかく　うれる。
description.tw:
Lovely, red-colored sand with a
loose,
silky feel. It can be sold at a high
price to shops.

description.en:
A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles
in a red color. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.
description.cn:
A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles
in a red color. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.
description.de:
Teil eines hübschen Edelsteins, der
in
rötlicher Farbe schimmert. Erzielt
einen
hohen Preis, wenn man ihn verkauft.
description.fr:
Fragment de gemme qui brille d'un
éclat
rouge. Peut se vendre à bon prix aux
magasins.
description.it:
Frammento rosso acceso di una gemma.
Si può vendere a un prezzo piuttosto
alto nei negozi.
description.es:
Fragmento de una bonita gema roja
que puede venderse muy caro en las
tiendas.
description.ja:
キラキラと　あかく　ひかる
きれいな　ほうせきの　かけら。
ショップで　たかく　うれる。
description.tw:
A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles
in a red color. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.

description.en:
A nugget of pure gold that gives off
a
lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.
description.cn:
A nugget of pure gold that gives off
a
lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.
description.de:
Ein Nugget aus purem Gold, das
einen schimmernden Glanz besitzt.
Es ist von großem Wert.
description.fr:
Pépite d'or pur qui brille
magnifiquement. Peut être vendue
à bon prix aux magasins.
description.it:
Pepita d'oro puro dal luccichio
sfavillante. Si può vendere a un
prezzo
piuttosto alto nei negozi.
description.es:
Pepita de oro puro que desprende
un brillo espectacular. Puede
venderse
muy cara en las tiendas.
description.ja:
キラキラと　きんいろに　ひかる
じゅんきん　せいの　たま。
ショップで　たかく　うれる。
description.tw:
A nugget of pure gold that gives off
a
lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.

description.en:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in
the
colors of the rainbow.
description.cn:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in
the
colors of the rainbow.
description.de:
Eine hübsche, herzförmige, sehr
seltene Schuppe. Sie erstrahlt
in den Farben des Regenbogens.
description.fr:
Une jolie écaille en forme de cœur
qui
est très rare. Elle brille légèrement
d'un éclat arc-en-ciel.
description.it:
Squama graziosa, a forma di cuore e
molto rara. Riflette tutti i colori
dell'iride.
description.es:
Bella escama con forma de corazón
que brilla ligeramente como los
colores
del arcoíris. Es muy poco común.
description.ja:
きれいな　ハートの　かたちの
とても　めずらしい　ウロコ。
にじいろに　うすく　かがやく。
description.tw:
A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is
extremely rare. It glows faintly in
the
colors of the rainbow.

description.en:
A sweet honey with a lush aroma that
attracts wild Pokémon when it is used
in grass, caves, or on special trees.
description.cn:
A sweet honey with a lush aroma that
attracts wild Pokémon when it is used
in grass, caves, or on special trees.
description.de:
Der Duft dieses Honigs lockt wilde
Pokémon an. Verwende ihn in hohem
Gras oder an besonderen Bäumen.
description.fr:
Un miel au parfum riche qui, utilisé
dans
l'herbe, une grotte ou sur des arbres
spéciaux, attire les Pokémon
sauvages.
description.it:
Miele dolce dall'aroma intenso che
attrae i Pokémon selvatici. Usalo
nelle
grotte, nell'erba o su alberi
speciali.
description.es:
Su delicioso aroma atrae a Pokémon
salvajes si se usa en zonas de hierba
alta, cuevas o árboles especiales.
description.ja:
くさむらや　どうくつ　などで
つかうと　あまいにおいに　さそわれて
やせいポケモンが　あらわれる。
description.tw:
A sweet honey with a lush aroma that
attracts wild Pokémon when it is used
in grass, caves, or on special trees.

description.en:
A bone that is extremely valuable for
Pokémon archeology. It can be sold
for a high price to shops.
description.cn:
A bone that is extremely valuable for
Pokémon archeology. It can be sold
for a high price to shops.
description.de:
Dieser Knochen erfreut jeden
Pokémon-Archäologen. Er ist
von hohem Wert.
description.fr:
Un os d'une grande valeur pour
l'archéologie Pokémon. Peut être
vendu à bon prix aux magasins.
description.it:
Osso di grande valore per l'archeolog
ia
Pokémon. Può essere venduto nei
negozi
a un prezzo piuttosto alto.
description.es:
Un hueso de gran valor para la
arqueología Pokémon. Puede alcanzar
un alto precio en las tiendas.
description.ja:
ポケモンこうこがくの　うえで
とても　きちょうな　ホネ。
ショップで　たかく　うれる。
description.tw:
A bone that is extremely valuable for
Pokémon archeology. It can be sold
for a high price to shops.

description.en:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.
description.cn:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.
description.de:
Dieser besondere, hell leuchtende
Stein hilft manchen Pokémon bei
ihrer Evolution.
description.fr:
Pierre étrange qui fait évoluer
certaines espèces de Pokémon. Elle
brille d'une lumière aveuglante.
description.it:
Pietra particolare che fa evolvere
determinate specie di Pokémon.
Brilla di una luce abbagliante.
description.es:
Una piedra peculiar que hace
evolucionar a algunos Pokémon.
Tiene un brillo espectacular.
description.ja:
ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　いし。
ひかりのように　まぶしい。
description.tw:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It shines with a dazzling light.

description.en:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as dark as dark can be.
description.cn:
A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is as dark as dark can be.
description.de:
Dieser besondere, düstere Stein
hilft manchen Pokémon bei
ihrer Evolution.
description.fr:

est tenue par un Pokémon.

para recuperarse de la parálisis.

まひを　かいふくする。

description.en:
When held by a Pokémon, if their HP
falls below half, it will heal for a
quarter of their max HP.
description.cn: Pokémon的HP在1/2以下时发动, HP回复最大值的1/4.
description.de:
Wenn von einem Pokémon gehalten,
werden die HP um ein Viertel der max
HP geheilt wenn die HP unter die
Hälfte fallen.
description.fr:
Lorsque tenu par un Pokémon, si les
PVs sont en dessous de 50%,
restaurera un quart des PVs max.
description.it:
Se tenuta da un Pokémon, se i suoi PS
scendono sotto la metà, restituisce
un un quarto dei PS massimi.
description.es:
Cuando la lleva un Pokémon, si sus PS
bajan a la mitad, le curará un cuarto
de sus PS totales.
description.ja:
When held by a ポケモン,
if their HP falls below half,
it will heal for a quarter of their
max HP.
description.tw: Pokémon的HP在1/2以下時發動, HP回覆最大值的1/4.

description.en:
If held by a Pokémon, it restores the
user's HP in a pinch, but will cause
confusion if it hates the taste.
description.cn:
If held by a Pokémon, it restores the
user's HP in a pinch, but will cause
confusion if it hates the taste.
description.de:
Als getragenes Item füllt die Beere
die
KP eines Pokémon auf, doch ihr Aroma
verwirrt jene, die es nicht mögen.
description.fr:
Tenue, cette Baie restaure des PV en
cas de besoin, mais rend confus si
le Pokémon n'aime pas son goût.
description.it:
Se tenuta da un Pokémon in
difficoltà,
restituisce PS. Se al Pokémon non
piace
il suo sapore, può causare
confusione.
description.es:
Los Pokémon pueden llevarla o usarla
para restaurar algunos PS. Su sabor
puede causar confusión.
description.ja:

ピンチのとき　ＨＰを　かいふくする。
きらいな　あじだと　こんらん　する。

riduce

Precisión

Pokémon.

description.en:

negative stat stage in battle.

Consumed on use.

wiederherstellt.

verbraucht.

changements de statut négatifs en
combat.

Consommé à l'utilisation.

le statistiche ridotte in lotta.

cualquier estadística bajada en
combate.

It snaps the holder out of

Pokémon携带后不会进化.

wird, während er einen Pichu züchtet,
lernt es Volttackle.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pikachu
qui double l'Attaque et l'Attaque Spé
en combat.

Si tenu par un Pikachu lors de la
reproduction, le Pichu apprendra
Électacle.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a Pikachu che
aumenta l'Attacco e l'Attacco Sp. in
battaglia.

Se tenuto da un Pikachu durante
l'allevamento il Pichu che ne nascerà
conoscerà la mossa Locomovolt.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pikachu que
duplica su Ataque y su At. Esp
durante el combate.

Si un Pikachu lo lleva al criar un
Pichu, éste aprenderá Placaje Eléc.
description.ja:
An item to be held by ピカチュウ
which doubles its Attack and
Sp.Attack
when in battle.

If held by a ピカチュウ while breeding a
ピチュー,
it will learn ボルテッカー.
description.tw:
給Pikachu攜帶的道具. 對戰中, 攻擊及特攻翻倍.

如果與Pichu生蛋時由Pikachu攜帶, 子代將習得Volt
Tackle.

données diverses et variées.

A transparent device filled with all
sorts of data.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It restores HP to the holder equal to
12.5% of damage inflicted by a move.

The effects of this item can be
nullified by the Heal Block ability.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
使用技能攻击时, 所造成全部伤害的总和的12.5%回复携带者的HP.

Heal Block特性能使之无效.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden kann.
Er gibt dem Besitzer 12,5% des
Schadens, der durch eine Bewegung
verursacht wird, zurück.

Die Effekte dieses Gegenstands können
durch die Heilblockade Fähigkeit
aufgehoben werden.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Il restaure les PV du teneur d'un
montant égal à 12.5% des dégâts
infligés par une capacité.

Les effets de cet objet peuvent être
annulés par le talent Anti-Soin.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Chi lo tiene recupera il 12.5% del
danno inflitto.

Il suo effetto può essere annullato
con l'abilità Anticura.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.
Restaura los PS del Pokémon que lo
lleva iguales al 12,5% del daño
infligido por un movimiento.

El efecto de este objeto puede ser
anulado por la habilidad Anticura.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.
It restores HP to the holder equal to
12.5% of damage inflicted by a move.
The effects of this item can be
nullified by the ability かいふくふうじ.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
使用技能攻擊時, 所造成全部傷害的總和的12.5%回覆攜帶者的HP.

Heal Block特效能使之無效.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Water-type
moves by 20%.

If held by a Marill or Azumarill while
breeding, it may help them produce a
Azurill egg.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
水系技能威力提升20%.

Marill或者Azumarill生蛋时携带将得到Azurill的蛋.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden muss.
Er erhöht die Kraft von Bewegungen des
Typs Wasser um 20 %.

Wenn er von einem Marill oder
Azumarill während der Zucht gehalten
wird, kann er ihnen helfen, ein
Azurill Ei zu produzieren.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Augmente de 20% la puissance des
attaques de type Eau.

Si tenu par un Marill ou un Azumarill
lors de la reproduction, il peut les
aider à produire un oeuf de Azurill.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Potenzia le mosse di tipo Acqua del
20%.

Se tenuto da Marill o Azumarill
durante l'allevamento, permetterà
loro di generare un uovo di Azurill.
description.es:
Objeto que puede llevar un Pokémon.
Aumenta la potencia de los movimientos
de tipo Agua un 20%.

Si la lleva un Marill o un Azumarill
al criar, puede ayudar a crear un
huevo de Azurill.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.
It increases the power of
Water-type moves by 20%.

it may help them produce a ルリリ egg.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
水系技能威力提升20%.

Marill或者Azumarill生蛋時攜帶將得到Azurill的蛋.

description.en:

Er reduziert die Genauigkeit des

Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.

description.it:

Riduce la Precisione del nemico.

Se tenuto da Wobbuffet durante

description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.

Si lo lleva un Wobbuffet al criar,

the holder move slower than usual.

description.en:
A long, thin, bright-red string to
be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
becomes infatuated, the foe does too.
description.cn:
A long, thin, bright-red string to
be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
becomes infatuated, the foe does too.
description.de:
Ein Item zum Tragen. Wird
der Träger vernarrt, gilt
dies auch für den Angreifer.
description.fr:
Un long fil rouge vif à faire tenir à
un
Pokémon. Si le porteur succombe à
l'attirance, l'ennemi aussi.
description.it:
Gomitolo di filo rosso sottile da
dare
a un Pokémon. Se il Pokémon rimane
infatuato, contagia anche il nemico.
description.es:
Un hilo largo y delgado de color rojo
que transmite el enamoramiento del
Pokémon que lo lleva a su objetivo.
description.ja:
ほそくて　ながい　まっかな　いと。
もたせると　メロメロに　なったとき
あいても　メロメロに　できる。
description.tw:
A long, thin, bright-red string to
be held by a Pokémon. If the holder
becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
When held by a Poison-type Pokémon in
battle, 6.25% of the holder's HP is
restored at the end of each turn.

When held by a Non-Poison-type
Pokémon, it inflicts 12.5% of damage
at the end of each turn. Pokémon with
the ability Magic Guard are immune to
this effect.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
对战中, 携带者每回合结束时HP回复6.25%.

如果非Poison系Pokémon携带, 每回合结束时将受到12.5%伤害.
特性为Magic Guard的Pokémon免疫此效果.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten wird.
Wenn er von einem Gift-Typ Pokémon im
Kampf gehalten wird, werden am Ende
jeder Runde 6,25% der HP des
Besitzers wiederhergestellt.

Wenn er von einem Nicht-Gift-Typ
Pokémon gehalten wird, fügt er am
Ende jeder Runde 12,5% Schaden zu.
Pokémon mit der Fähigkeit Magieschild
sind gegen diesen Effekt immun.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Lorsque tenu par un Pokémon de type
Poison en combat, 6.25% des PV du
teneur sont restaurés à la fin de
chaque tour.

Lorsque tenu par un Pokémon de type
non-Poison, il inflige 12.5% de
dégâts à la fin de chaque tour. Les
Pokémon avec le talent Garde Magik
sont immunisés à cet effet.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Se il Pokémon che lo tiene è di tipo
Veleno, recupererà il 6.25% dei PS ad
ogni turno.

Se il Pokémon che lo tiene non è di
tipo Veleno, subirà un danno del
12.5% ad ogni turno. Non danneggia i
Pokémon con l'abilità Magicscudo.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.
Cuando lo lleva un Pokémon de tipo
Veneno durante el combate, restaura
un 6,25% de los PS al final del
turno.

Cuando lo lleva un Pokémon que no es
de tipo Veneno, el objeto inflige un
12,5% de daño al final de cada turno.
Pokémon con la habilidad Muro Mágico
son inmunes a este efecto.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.
When held by a どく-type ポケモン in
battle,
6.25% of the holder's HP
is restored at the end of each turn.

When held by a Non-どく-type ポケモン,
it inflicts 12.5% of damage
at the end of each turn.
ポケモン with the ability マジックガード are
immune to this effect.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
對戰中, 攜帶者每回合結束時HP回覆6.25%.

如果非Poison系Pokémon攜帶, 每回合結束時將受到12.5%傷害.
特性為Magic Guard的Pokémon免疫此效果.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It extends the duration of Snowy
weather to 8 turns, when created by
the item holder.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
携带者引发的雪天将延长持续回合至8次.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden kann.
Er verlängert die Dauer von
Schneewetter auf 8 Runden, wenn es

wurde.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.

description.en:
When held by a Pokémon, it causes
binding moves used by the holder to
always continue for 7 turns.
description.cn: Pokémon携带后, 绑紧以及紧束等会持续造成伤害的招式的回合数为7.
description.de:
Wenn von einem Pokémon gehalten,
verursacht es, dass die vom Halter
verwendeten Bindungsattacken immer 7
Runden lang fortgesetzt werden.
description.fr:
Quand tenu par un Pokémon, fait que
les capacités étreignantes utilisées
par le porteur durent toujours 7
tours.
description.it:
Quando è tenuto da un Pokémon,
prolunga la durata delle mosse
intrappolanti, garantendo 7 turni.
description.es:
Cuando lo lleva un Pokémon, hace que
los movimientos que atrapan al rival
siempre estén activos durante 7
turnos.
description.ja:
When held by a ポケモン,
it causes binding moves used by
the holder to always continue for 7
turns.
description.tw: Pokémon攜帶後, 綁緊以及緊束等會持續造成傷害的招式的回合數為7.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase Speed
by 50% when in battle, but only
allows the use of the first move
selected.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
战斗时速度提升50%, 但只允许使用选定的第一个技能.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden kann.
Das Halten dieses Gegenstandes erhöht
die Schnelligkeit im Kampf um 50%,
erlaubt aber nur den Einsatz der
ersten ausgewählten Attacke.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Tenir cet objet augmentera la Vitesse
de 50% en combat, mais ne permet
l'utilisation que de la première
capacité sélectionnée.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Tenere questo strumento aumenterà la
Velocità del 50% in battaglia, ma
consentirà l'uso di una sola mossa.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.
Aumenta la Velocidad un 50% durante el
combate, pero sólo permite usar el
primer movimiento seleccionado.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.
Holding this item will increase
Speed by 50% when in battle,
but only allows the use
of the first move selected.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
戰鬥時速度提升50%, 但只允許使用選定的第一個技能.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It inflicts the holder with 12.5% of
its maximum HP each turn.

If the holder is hit with a move that
makes contact, the Sticky Barb will
latch onto the opponent.

Pokémon with the ability Magic Guard
do not take damage from this item.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
对战中, 携带者每回合结束时将受到相当于
12.5%生命的伤害.

如果携带者被Sticky Barb接触类技能命中, 此伤害将转移到对手身
上.
特性为Magic Guard的Pokémon免疫此效果.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden kann..
Er fügt dem Träger jede Runde 12,5 %
seiner maximalen HP zu.
Wird der Träger mit einer Attacke
getroffen, die ihn berührt, klammert
sich der Klettdorn an den Gegner.

Pokémon mit der Fähigkeit Magieschild
erleidet durch diesen Gegenstand
keinen Schaden.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Il inflige au teneur 12.5% de ses PV
Max en dégâts chaque tour.

Si le teneur est touché par une
capacité de contact, le Piquants
s'accrochera à l'adversaire.

Les Pokémon avec le talent Garde Magik
ne prennent pas de dégâts de cet
objet.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Danneggia chi la tiene del 12.5% dei
suoi PS massimi ad ogni turno.

Se chi lo tiene viene colpito con una
mossa da contatto la Vischiopunta
verrà trasferita sul nemico, se
questo non tiene alcun oggetto.

Non danneggia i Pokémon con l'abilità
Magicscudo.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.
Inflige al poseedor un 12,5% de sus PS
máximos cada turno.

Si éste recibe daño por un movimiento
que haga contacto, la Toxiestrella se
pegará al oponente.

Pokémon con la habilidad Muro Mágico
no reciben daño de este objeto.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.
It inflicts the holder with 12.5% of
its maximum HP each turn.

If the holder is hit with a move that
makes contact
the くっつきバリ will latch onto the
opponent.

ポケモン with the abilityマジックガード
do not take damage from this item.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
對戰中, 攜帶者每回合結束時將受到相當於
12.5%生命的傷害.

如果攜帶者被Sticky Barb接觸類技能命中, 此傷害將轉移到對手身
上.
特性為Magic Guard的Pokémon免疫此效果.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon when
breeding.
Holding this item will guarantee the
child inherits this Pokémon's Attack
IV.

This item is consumed upon use.
description.cn:
Pokémon生蛋时携带的道具.
携带此道具的Pokémon一定能遗传攻击个体值给子代.

一次性消耗品.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
bei der Zucht gehalten werden kann.
Das Halten dieses Gegenstandes
garantiert, dass das Kind die Angriff
IV dieses Pokémons erbt.

Dieser Gegenstand wird bei Verwendung
verbraucht.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon
lors de la reproduction.
Tenir cet objet garantit
l'héritage de l'IV Attaque de ce
Pokémon.

Cet objet est consommé lors de
l'utilisation.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon
durante l'allevamento.
Chi tiene questo strumento garantirà
al figlio l'eredità degli IV in
Attacco di questo Pokémon.

Si può usare una volta sola.
description.es:
Objeto que puede llevar un Pokémon al
criar.
Llevar este objeto garantiza que su
hijo herede los IV de Ataque de este
Pokémon.

Este objeto se consume al usarlo.

child inherits this ポケモン's Attack IV.

This item is consumed upon use.

Pokémon生蛋時攜帶的道具.
攜帶此道具的Pokémon一定能遺傳HP個體值給子代.

一次性消耗品.

description.en:
A tough, discarded carapace to be
held
by a Pokémon. It enables the holder
to
switch with a waiting Pokémon in
battle.
description.cn:
A tough, discarded carapace to be
held
by a Pokémon. It enables the holder
to
switch with a waiting Pokémon in
battle.
description.de:
Ein Item zum Tragen. Dieser harte
Panzer ermöglicht den Austausch des
Trägers gegen ein wartendes Pokémon.
description.fr:
Objet à tenir. Carapace dure qui
permet
au porteur de se retirer même s'il
est
affecté par une attaque immobilisant
e.
description.it:
Un Pokémon con questo robusto guscio
può sfuggire al nemico anche se
questi
ha usato mosse o abilità intrappolant
i.
description.es:
En combate, esta concha desechada
sirve para que un Pokémon se cambie
por otro que no esté combatiendo.
description.ja:
じょうぶで　かたい　ぬけがら。
もたせた　ポケモンは　ひかえの
ポケモンと　かならず　いれかわれる。
description.tw:
A tough, discarded carapace to be
held
by a Pokémon. It enables the holder
to
switch with a waiting Pokémon in
battle.

description.en:
A Pokémon held item that boosts the
power of HP-stealing moves to let the
holder recover more HP.
description.cn:
A Pokémon held item that boosts the
power of HP-stealing moves to let the
holder recover more HP.
description.de:
Ein Item zum Tragen. Verstärkt
KP-stehlende Attacken.
description.fr:
Objet à tenir augmentant la puissance
des attaques volant des PV.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Potenzia le mosse ruba-PS facendo
recuperare più PS a chi lo usa.
description.es:
El Pokémon que la lleva recupera
más PS al usar movimientos que
drenan al objetivo.
description.ja:
もたせると　ＨＰを　すいとる　わざで
いつもより　おおく　じぶんの　ＨＰを
かいふくできる。
description.tw:
A Pokémon held item that boosts the
power of HP-stealing moves to let the
holder recover more HP.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Holding this item will increase Sp.Atk
by 50% when in battle, but only
allows the use of the first move
selected.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
战斗时特攻提升50%, 但只允许使用选定的第一个技能.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden kann.
Das Halten dieses Gegenstandes erhöht
den Spezialangriff im Kampf um 50%,
erlaubt aber nur den Einsatz der
ersten ausgewählten Attacke.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Cet objet augmentera l'Attaque Spé du
porteur de 50% en combat, mais ne
permet l'utilisation que de la
première capacité sélectionnée.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Tenere questo strumento aumenterà
l'Attacco Sp. del 50% in battaglia,
ma consentirà l'uso di una sola
mossa.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.
Aumenta el At. Esp un 50% durante el
combate, pero sólo permite usar el
primer movimiento seleccionado.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.
Holding this item will increase
Sp.Atk by 50% when in battle,
but only allows the use of
the first move selected.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
戰鬥時特攻提升50%, 但只允許使用選定的第一個技能.

description.en: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It increases the power of Psychic-type moves by 20%. If held by a Mr. Mime while breeding, it may help them produce a Mime Jr. egg
description.cn: 给宝可梦携带的道具。超能力系技能威力提升20%。魔墙人偶生蛋时携带将得到魔尼尼的蛋

description.en: An item to be held by a Pokémon. it causes the Pokémon to move last when using a move of the same priority as the opponent. If held by a Snorlax while breeding, it may help them produce a Munchlax egg

An item to be held by a Pokémon.

If held by a Roselia or Roserade while
breeding, it may help them produce a
Budew egg.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
草系技能威力提升20%.

Roselia或者Roserade生蛋时携带, 将得到Budew的蛋.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon

Es erhöht die Stärke von Pflanzenatta
cken um 20%.

Wenn es von einem Roselia oder
Roseradebei der Zucht gehalten wird,
kann es vielleicht dabei helfen, ein
Knospi Ei zu produzieren.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Augmente de 20% la puissance des
attaques de type Plante.

Si tenu par un Rosélia ou un Roserade
lors de la reproduction, il peut les
aider à produire un œuf de
Rozbouton.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Potenzia le mosse di tipo Erba del
20%.

Se tenuto da Roselia o Roserade
durante l'allevamento, permetterà
loro di generare un uovo di Budew.
description.es:
Objeto que puede llevar un Pokémon.
Aumenta la potencia de los movimientos
de tipo Planta un 20%.

Si la lleva un Roselia o un Roserade
al criar, puede ayudar a crear un
huevo de Budew.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.
It increases the power of
Grass-type moves by 20%.

If held by a ロゼリア or
ロズレイド while breeding,
it may help them produce a スボミー egg.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
草系技能威力提升20%.

Roselia或者Roserade生蛋時攜帶, 將得到Budew的蛋.

description.en: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If held by a Chansey while breeding, it may help them produce a Happiny egg
description.cn: 给宝可梦携带的道具。如果吉利蛋生蛋时携带，则可能生出小福蛋的蛋
description.de: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If held by a Chansey while breeding, it may help them produce a Happiny egg
description.fr: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If held by a Chansey while breeding, it may help them produce a Happiny egg

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It slightly reduces the chance of
encountering wild Pokémon.

If held by a Chimecho while breeding,
it may help them produce a Chingling
egg.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
携带者排配置在队伍首位时, 降低遇见野生宝可梦的几率.

生蛋时由Chimecho携带将得到Chingling的蛋.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden sollte.
Er verringert leicht die Wahrscheinli
chkeit, auf wilde Pokémon zu treffen.

Wenn er von einem Palimpalim bei der
Zucht gehalten wird, kann es ihm
helfen, ein Klingplim Ei zu
produzieren.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Réduit légèrement les chances de
rencontrer des Pokémon sauvages.

Si tenu par un Éoko lors de la
reproduction, il peut l'aider à
produire un œuf de Korillon.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Aiuta ad allontanare i Pokémon
selvatici se chi lo tiene è il primo
della squadra.

Se tenuto da Chimecho durante
l'allevamento, permetterà loro di
generare un uovo di Chingling.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.
Reduce un poco la probabilidad de
encontrar Pokémon salvajes.

Si lo lleva un Chimecho al criar,
puede ayudar a crear un huevo de
Chingling.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.

It slightly reduces
the chance of encountering wild ポケモン.

If held by a チリーン while breeding,
it may help them produce a リーシャン egg.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
攜帶者排配置在隊伍首位時, 降低遇見野生寶可夢的機率.

生蛋時由Chimecho攜帶將得到Chingling的蛋.

description.en:
A protective item of some sort.
It is extremely stiff and heavy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
description.cn:
A protective item of some sort.
It is extremely stiff and heavy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Ein schützendes Item. Steif
und schwer. Das Lieblingsstück
eines bestimmten Pokémon.

Objet protecteur très dur et très
lourd, apprécié d'un certain Pokémon.

Strumento protettivo, molto duro e
pesante, prediletto da un Pokémon
in particolare.

Dispositivo de protección muy pesado.
Cierto Pokémon lo adora.
description.ja:
なにかの　プロテクター。
とても　かたくて　おもい。
ある　ポケモンが　このんでいる。
description.tw:
A protective item of some sort.
It is extremely stiff and heavy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

A box packed with a tremendous
amount of electric energy.

A box packed with a tremendous
amount of electric energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Une boîte remplie d'une énorme
quantité

questo

Cierto Pokémon lo adora.

とてつもない　でんきの　エネルギーが

description.tw:
A box packed with a tremendous
amount of electric energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Une boîte remplie d'une énorme
quantité

Un Pokémon in particolare adora

Esta caja contiene una enorme

Cierto Pokémon lo adora.
description.ja:
とてつもない　マグマの　エネルギーが

description.tw:
A box packed with a tremendous

It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

description.en:
A transparent device overflowing with
dubious data.
Its producer is unknown.
description.cn:
A transparent device overflowing with
dubious data.
Its producer is unknown.

Eine Scheibe mit seltsamen Daten.

Appareil transparent rempli de

connu.

Dispositivo trasparente strapieno

description.es:
Dispositivo transparente que contiene
datos misteriosos. Es de fabricante

description.ja:
なかに　あやしい　じょうほうが

せいさくしゃは　ふめい。
description.tw:
A transparent device overflowing with
dubious data.
Its producer is unknown.

description.en:
A cloth imbued with horrifyingly
strong
spiritual energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

A cloth imbued with horrifyingly
strong
spiritual energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

Ein Stoffumhang mit geistiger

eines bestimmten Pokémon.

Un tissu imprégné d'une énergie
spirituelle horriblement puissante.
Apprécié d'un certain Pokémon.

Panno intriso di un'energia
spirituale
terribilmente forte. Un Pokémon in
particolare adora questo strumento.
description.es:
Tela imbuida de una energía

おそろしく　つよい　れいりょくが

ある　ポケモンが　このんでいる。
description.tw:
A cloth imbued with horrifyingly
strong
spiritual energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a sharply hooked claw that ups
the holder's critical-hit ratio.
description.cn:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a sharply hooked claw that ups
the holder's critical-hit ratio.
description.de:
Ein Item zum Tragen.
Die scharfe Klaue erhöht die
Volltrefferquote des Trägers.
description.fr:
Objet à tenir. Griffe crochue
et pointue augmentant le taux
de critiques.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Artiglio che aumenta le probabilità
per
chi lo tiene di sferrare dei brutti
colpi.
description.es:
Aumenta la probabilidad de que
el Pokémon que la lleve consiga
un golpe crítico.
description.ja:
するどく　とがった　ツメ。
もたせると　わざが　きゅうしょに
あたりやすくなる。
description.tw:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a sharply hooked claw that ups
the holder's critical-hit ratio.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may make foes and allies flinch
when the holder inflicts damage.
description.cn:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may make foes and allies flinch
when the holder inflicts damage.
description.de:
Ein Item zum Tragen.
Verursacht der Träger Schaden,
erschrickt das Ziel eventuell.
description.fr:
Objet à tenir pouvant apeurer

quand le porteur lui inflige des
dégâts.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Chi lo tiene può far tentennare il
nemico
colpito.
description.es:
Si lo lleva un Pokémon cuando inflige
daño a otro, puede hacer retroceder
a este último.
description.ja:
するどく　とがった　キバ。
もたせると　ダメージを　あたえたとき
ひるませることが　ある。
description.tw:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It may make foes and allies flinch
when the holder inflicts damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - ドラゴンクロー

description.en:
The user slashes the target with
huge, sharp claws.
description.cn:
The user slashes the target with
huge, sharp claws.
description.de:
Das Ziel wird mit riesigen, scharfen
Klauen stark verletzt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur lacère l'ennemi de ses
grandes griffes aiguisées.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca con artigli
affilati che graffiano il nemico
rapidamente e con grande forza.
description.es:
Araña al objetivo con garras
afiladas.
description.ja:
するどく　とがった　きょだいな　ツメで あいてを　きりさいて　こうげき
する。
description.tw:
The user slashes the target with
huge, sharp claws.

name.ja: わざマシン - サイコショック

description.en:
The user materializes an odd psychic
wave to attack the target. This
attack does physical damage.
description.cn:
The user materializes an odd psychic
wave to attack the target. This
attack does physical damage.
description.de:
Anwender erzeugt eine seltsame
Energiewelle, die dem Ziel
physischen Schaden zufügt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur matérialise des ondes
mystérieuses qu'il projette sur
l'ennemi. Inflige des dégâts
physiques.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca il bersaglio
facendo materializzare un
misterioso raggio psichico che
provoca danni fisici.
description.es:
Crea una onda psíquica que golpea al
objetivo y provoca un gran daño.
description.ja:
ふしぎな　ねんぱを　じったいかして あいてを　こうげきする。
ぶつりてきな　ダメージを　あたえる。
description.tw:
The user materializes an odd psychic
wave to attack the target. This
attack does physical damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - めいそう

description.en:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and calms its spirit to raise its
Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
description.cn:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and calms its spirit to raise its
Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
description.de:
Erhöht Spezial-Angriff und
Spezial-Verteidigung durch
Konzentration.
description.fr:
Le lanceur se concentre et fait le
vide dans son esprit pour monter
son Attaque Spéciale et sa Défense
Spéciale.
description.it:
Chi la usa, meditando, placa il
proprio spirito per aumentare
l'Attacco Speciale e la Difesa
Speciale.
description.es:
Aumenta la concentración y calma el
espíritu para subir el Ataque
Especial y la Defensa Especial.
description.ja:
しずかに　せいしんを　とういつし こころを　しずめる　ことで　じぶんの
とくこうと　とくぼうを　あげる。
description.tw:
The user quietly focuses its mind
and calms its spirit to raise its
Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

name.ja: わざマシン - ほえる

description.en:
The target is scared off and
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.
description.cn:
The target is scared off and
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.
description.de:
Verjagt das Ziel und ersetzt es
durch ein anderes Pokémon. Beendet
den Kampf in der Wildnis.
description.fr:
Effraie le Pokémon ennemi et le
remplace par un autre. Dans la
nature, met fin au combat.
description.it:
Il bersaglio è costretto a lasciare
il campo e viene sostituito. Mette
fine alle lotte contro Pokémon
selvatici.
description.es:
Se lleva al objetivo, que es
cambiado por otro Pokémon. Si es un
Pokémon salvaje, acaba el combate.
description.ja:
あいてを　にがして ひかえの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
やせいの　ばあいは　せんとうが　おわる。
description.tw:
The target is scared off and
replaced by another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name.ja: わざマシン - どくどく

description.en:
A move that leaves the target badly
poisoned. Its poison damage worsens
every turn.
description.cn:
A move that leaves the target badly
poisoned. Its poison damage worsens
every turn.
description.de:
Vergiftet das Ziel mit einem
potenten Toxin schwer. Vergiftung
wird von Runde zu Runde stärker.
description.fr:
Empoisonne gravement l'ennemi. Les
dégâts dus au poison augmentent à
chaque tour.
description.it:
Iperavvelena il nemico con una
potente tossina. Il danno peggiora
ad ogni turno.
description.es:
Envenena gravemente al objetivo y
causa un daño mayor en cada turno.
description.ja:
あいてを　もうどくの じょうたいに　する。ターンが　すすむほど
どくの　ダメージが　ふえていく。
description.tw:
A move that leaves the target badly
poisoned. Its poison damage worsens
every turn.

description.en:
A snowstorm forms on the field for 5
turns. Snow boosts the Defense stat
of Ice-types by 50%.
description.cn: 在5回合内会下雪. 冰属性的防御提高50%.
description.de:
Ein Schneesturm bildet sich für 5
Runden auf dem Spielfeld. Schnee
erhöht die Verteidigungswerte von
Eis-Typen um 50%.
description.fr:
Une tempête de neige se forme sur le
terrain pendant 5 tours. La neige
augmente la stat de défense des
types de glace de 50%.
description.it:
Scatena una tempesta di Neve in
campo per 5 turni. Aumenta la
difesa dei tipi Ghiaccio del 50%.
description.es:
Forma una tormenta de nieve en el
campo durante 5 turnos. Aumenta la
defensa de los tipo hielo un 50%.
description.ja:
A snowstorm forms on the field for 5
turns. Snow boosts the Defense stat
of Ice-types by 50%.
description.tw: 在5回合內會下雪. 冰屬性的防禦提高50%.

name.ja: わざマシン - ビルドアップ

description.en:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up its body, boosting both its
Attack and Defense stats.
description.cn:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up its body, boosting both its
Attack and Defense stats.
description.de:
Pumpt den Körper auf, um den Angriff
und die Verteidigung zu erhöhen.
description.fr:
Le lanceur tend ses muscles pour se
gonfler, ce qui booste son Attaque
et sa Défense.
description.it:
Chi la usa tende i muscoli per
gonfiare il corpo, aumentando
Difesa e Attacco.
description.es:
Robustece el cuerpo para subir el
Ataque y la Defensa.
description.ja:
からだに　ちからを　こめて　きんにくを ぶあつく　することで　じぶんの
こうげきと　ぼうぎょを　あげる。
description.tw:
The user tenses its muscles to bulk
up its body, boosting both its
Attack and Defense stats.

name.ja: わざマシン - ベノムショック

description.en:
The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is
poisoned.
description.cn:
The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is
poisoned.
description.de:
Überschüttet das Ziel mit einer
speziellen toxischen Flüssigkeit.
Doppelt so stark gegen vergiftete
Ziele.
description.fr:
Le lanceur inocule un poison spécial
à l'ennemi. L'effet est doublé si
l'ennemi est déjà empoisonné.
description.it:
Lancia uno speciale liquido tossico
sul bersaglio. Se questi è
avvelenato, il danno provocato
raddoppia.
description.es:
Ataca cubriendo al objetivo con un
líquido venenoso. El daño será
doble si este ya está envenenado.
description.ja:
とくしゅな　どくえきを　あびせかける。 どく　じょうたいの　あいてには
いりょくが　２ばいに　なる。
description.tw:
The user drenches the target in a
special poisonous liquid. Its power
is doubled if the target is
poisoned.

name.ja: わざマシン - めざめるパワー

description.en:
An attack which varies in type
depending on its user. Its type may
be changed with 40 Gems.
description.cn: 技能的属性取决于不同的使用者. 属性可以用40个宝石修改.
description.de:
Eine Attacke, die je nach Anwender
in ihrer Art variiert. Seine Art
kann mit 40 Edelsteinen geändert
werden.
description.fr:
Une attaque dont le type varie en
fonction de son utilisateur. Son
type peut être changé avec 40
Gemmes.
description.it:
Attacco il cui tipo varia a seconda
dell'utilizzatore. Il suo tipo può
essere cambiato per 40 Gemme.
description.es:
Ataque cuyo tipo varía dependiendo
del usuario. Su tipo puede
cambiarse con 40 gemas.
description.ja:
An attack which varies in type
depending on its user. Its type may
be changed with 40 Gems.
description.tw: 技能的屬性取決於不同的使用者. 屬性可以用40個寶石修改.

name.ja: わざマシン - にほんばれ

description.en:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up Fire-type
moves.
description.cn:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up Fire-type
moves.
description.de:
Die Sonne brennt unbarmherzig fünf
Runden lang. Dadurch werden
Attacken vom Typ Feuer verstärkt.
description.fr:
Fait briller le soleil pendant 5
tours et améliore les capacités de
type Feu.
description.it:
Chi la usa intensifica i raggi
solari per cinque turni,
potenziando le mosse di tipo
Fuoco.
description.es:
Quien lo usa intensifica el sol
durante cinco turnos, lo que
potencia los movimientos de tipo
Fuego.
description.ja:
５ターンの　あいだ　ひざしを つよくして　ほのおタイプの
わざの　いりょくを　あげる。
description.tw:
The user intensifies the sun for
five turns, powering up Fire-type
moves.

name.ja: わざマシン - れいとうビーム

description.en:
The target is struck with an
icy-cold beam of energy. It may
also freeze the target solid.
description.cn:
The target is struck with an
icy-cold beam of energy. It may
also freeze the target solid.
description.de:
Das Ziel wird von einem Eisstrahl
getroffen und friert eventuell
ein.
description.fr:
Un rayon de glace frappe l'ennemi.
Peut aussi le geler.
description.it:
Il nemico è colpito da un raggio di
energia gelida che può anche
congelarlo.
description.es:
Rayo de hielo que puede llegar a
congelar.
description.ja:
こごえる　ビームを あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
こおり　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
The target is struck with an
icy-cold beam of energy. It may
also freeze the target solid.

name.ja: わざマシン - ふぶき

description.en:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the opposing team. It may
also freeze them solid.
description.cn:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the opposing team. It may
also freeze them solid.
description.de:
Ein Schneesturm wütet, der das Ziel
einfrieren kann.
description.fr:
Une violente tempête de neige est
déclenchée sur l'ennemi. Peut aussi
le geler.
description.it:
Colpisce i bersagli con una tremenda
tempesta di ghiaccio che può anche
congelarli.
description.es:
Tormenta de hielo que puede llegar a
congelar.
description.ja:
はげしい　ふぶきを あいてに　ふきつけて　こうげきする。
こおり　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
A howling blizzard is summoned to
strike the opposing team. It may
also freeze them solid.

name.ja: わざマシン - はかいこうせん

description.en:
The target is attacked with a
powerful beam. The user must rest
on the next turn to regain its
energy.
description.cn:
The target is attacked with a
powerful beam. The user must rest
on the next turn to regain its
energy.
description.de:
Starke Attacke, die den Angreifer
zwingt, eine Runde auszusetzen.
description.fr:
Projette un puissant rayon sur
l'ennemi. Le lanceur doit se
reposer au tour suivant.
description.it:
Colpisce il nemico con un potente
raggio. Chi la usa salta il turno
successivo per recuperare energia.
description.es:
Es eficaz, pero el atacante deberá
descansar en el siguiente turno.
description.ja:
つよい　こうせんを あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。
つぎの　ターンは　うごけなく　なる。
description.tw:
The target is attacked with a
powerful beam. The user must rest
on the next turn to regain its
energy.

name.ja: わざマシン - ひかりのかべ

description.en:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from special
attacks for five turns.
description.cn:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from special
attacks for five turns.
description.de:
Erzeugt eine Lichtwand und senkt

description.fr:
Un fabuleux mur de lumière qui
réduit les dégâts causés par les
attaques spéciales durant 5 tours.

Innalza una barriera di luce

squadra per cinque turni.

Pared de luz que reduce durante

description.ja:
５ターンの　あいだ　ふしぎな　かべで あいてから　うける　とくしゅ　こ
うげきの ダメージを　よわめる。
description.tw:
A wondrous wall of light is put up
to suppress damage from special
attacks for five turns.

name.ja: わざマシン - まもる

description.en:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.
description.cn:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.
description.de:
Anwender weicht jeder Attacke aus.
Scheitert eventuell bei Wiederholu
ng.

Le lanceur esquive toutes les
attaques. Plus la capacité est

elle risque d'échouer.
description.it:
Permette di eludere tutti gli
attacchi. Se usata in successione

Frena todos los ataques, pero puede
fallar si se usa repetidamente.

あいての　こうげきを まったく　うけない。 れんぞくで　だすと　しっぱ
い　しやすい。
description.tw:
It enables the user to evade all
attacks. Its chance of failing
rises if it is used in succession.

name.ja: わざマシン - テレキネシス

description.en:
The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is
easier to hit for three turns.
description.cn:
The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is
easier to hit for three turns.
description.de:

Un pouvoir qui fait flotter l'ennemi

Chi la usa fa galleggiare in aria il

El usuario emplea su poder mental

ちょうのうりょくで　あいてを　うかせる。 ３ターンの　あいだ　こうげきが

The user makes the target float with
its psychic power. The target is
easier to hit for three turns.

name.ja: わざマシン - しんぴのまもり

The user creates a protective field

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems for
five turns.

Team des Anwenders ist fünf Runden

Champ protecteur empêchant tous les

Chi la usa crea un campo protettivo

Crea un campo protector que evita

turnos.

The user creates a protective field
that prevents status problems for
five turns.

name.ja: わざマシン - やつあたり

A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes

description.cn:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

Die Attacke wird stärker, je weniger

Moins le Pokémon aime son Dresseur,

Mossa che diventa tanto più potente

affezione del Pokémon per il
proprio Allenatore.

Cuanto menor sea la amistad con el

ふまんを　はらすため　ぜんりょくで あいてを　こうげきする。なついて

A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the less the user likes
its Trainer.

A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam

A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam
on the second turn.

Primer turno: absorbe luz. Segundo

１ターンめに　ひかりを　いっぱいに あつめ　２ターンめに　ひかりの　た

A two-turn attack. The user gathers
light, then blasts a bundled beam
on the second turn.

name.ja: わざマシン - うちおとす

The user throws a stone or

The user throws a stone or
projectile to attack an opponent. A
flying Pokémon will fall to the
ground when hit.

A strong electric blast is loosed at

A strong electric blast is loosed at
the target. It may also leave the

Une grosse décharge électrique tombe

Il bersaglio viene colpito da una

Potente ataque eléctrico que puede

つよい　でんげきを あいてに　あびせて　こうげきする。

A strong electric blast is loosed at
the target. It may also leave the
target with paralysis.

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on

paralysis.

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on
the target to inflict damage. It
may also leave the target with
paralysis.

Eine verheerende Elektro-Attacke,
die das Ziel eventuell paralysier
t.

La foudre tombe sur l'ennemi pour

Il nemico è colpito da un lampo

はげしい　かみなりを あいてに　おとして　こうげきする。

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on

paralysis.

name.ja: わざマシン - おんがえし

description.en:
A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

A full-power attack that grows more
powerful the more the user likes
its Trainer.

Angriff, dessen Kraft bei

Une attaque furieuse dont la

Mossa che diventa tanto più potente

Cuanto mayor sea la amistad con el

description.ja:
トレーナーの　ために　ぜんりょくで あいてを　こうげきする。

description.tw:
A full-power attack that grows more

its Trainer.

The target is hit by a strong

Une puissante force télékinésique

つよい　ねんりきを　あいてに　おくって こうげきする。あいての　とくぼ

The target is hit by a strong
telekinetic force. It may also
reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

The user hurls a shadowy blob at the

The user hurls a shadowy blob at the

By moving rapidly, the user makes

すばやい　うごきで　ぶんしんを　つくり あいてを　まどわせて

its evasiveness.

A wondrous wall of light is put up

attacks for five turns.
description.cn:

Eine mysteriöse Wand, die fünf

Un fabuleux mur de lumière qui

description.es:
Pared de luz que reduce durante
cinco turnos el daño producido por

description.ja:
５ターンの　あいだ　ふしぎな　かべで あいてから　うける　ぶつり　こう

A wondrous wall of light is put up

It swamps the area around the user

also poison those hit.

with a giant sludge wave. It may

The target is scorched with an

leave the target with a burn.

The target is scorched with an
intense blast of fire. It may also
leave the target with a burn.

Starke Feuer-Attacke, durch die das

L'ennemi reçoit un torrent de

Il nemico viene colpito da intense

Ataca con una gran ráfaga de fuego

はげしい　ほのおを あいてに　はっしゃして　こうげきする。

The target is scorched with an
intense blast of fire. It may also
leave the target with a burn.

Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target. It may also poison the
target.

Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target. It may also poison the
target.

wird eventuell vergiftet.

Des détritus toxiques sont projetés

l'empoisonner.

Chi la usa attacca lanciando fango
sul bersaglio. Può anche
avvelenarlo.

Arroja residuos al objetivo. Puede

きたない　ヘドロを あいてに　なげつけて　こうげきする。

Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the
target. It may also poison the
target.

A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to

hurt all combatants except the

Tormenta de arena que dura cinco

５ターンの　あいだ　すなあらしで いわ　じめん　はがねタイプ　いがいの

A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to
hurt all combatants except the
Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

name.ja: わざマシン - がんせきふうじ

Boulders are hurled at the target.
It also lowers the target's Speed
by preventing its movement.

Boulders are hurled at the target.
It also lowers the target's Speed
by preventing its movement.

Des rochers frappent l'ennemi.

がんせきを　なげつけて　こうげきする。 あいての　うごきを　ふうじるこ

Boulders are hurled at the target.

by preventing its movement.

The user confounds the target with
speed, then slashes. The attack

speed, then slashes. The attack

speed, then slashes. The attack
lands without fail.

using the same move twice in a
row.

target, making it incapable of
using the same move twice in a
row.

Erzürnt das Ziel, um wiederholten

Le lanceur irrite l'ennemi pour

Atormenta y enfurece al objetivo,

あいてに　いちゃもんを　つけて　 おなじ　わざを　２かい　れんぞくで

description.tw:
The user torments and enrages the
target, making it incapable of
using the same move twice in a
row.

name.ja: わざマシン - からげんき

An attack move that doubles its
power if the user is poisoned,
burned, or has paralysis.

An attack move that doubles its
power if the user is poisoned,
burned, or has paralysis.
description.de:
Doppelte Stärke nach Verbrennung,

じぶんが　どく　まひ　やけど じょうたいの　とき　あいてに　くりだすと

An attack move that doubles its
power if the user is poisoned,
burned, or has paralysis.

The user cloaks itself with flame

power, it raises the user's Speed

and attacks. Building up more
power, it raises the user's Speed
stat.
