description.it:
Chi la usa si copre di fuoco e
attacca il bersaglio. Concentrando
si aumenta, inoltre, la propria
Velocità.
description.es:
Llamas que golpean al objetivo y
aumentan la Velocidad del
atacante.
description.ja:
ほのおを　まとい　あいてを こうげきする。ちからを　ためて　じぶんの
すばやさを　あげる。
description.tw:
The user cloaks itself with flame
and attacks. Building up more
power, it raises the user's Speed
stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - ねむる

description.en:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user's
HP and heals any status problem.
description.cn:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user's
HP and heals any status problem.
description.de:
Anwender wird vollkommen geheilt und
schläft die folgenden zwei Runden.
description.fr:
Le lanceur dort pendant 2 tours. Il
regagne tous ses PV et n'a plus de
problèmes de statut.
description.it:
Chi la usa dorme per due turni.
Recupera, però, tutti i PS e
risolve tutti i suoi problemi di
stato.
description.es:
Restaura todos los PS y cura todos
los problemas de estado del
usuario. Duerme los dos próximos
turnos.
description.ja:
２ターンの　あいだ　ねむり　つづける。 じぶんの　ＨＰと　じょうたいい
じょうを すべて　かいふく　する。
description.tw:
The user goes to sleep for two
turns. It fully restores the user's
HP and heals any status problem.

name.ja: わざマシン - メロメロ

description.en:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.
description.cn:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.
description.de:
Angriff auf Anwender vom anderen
Geschlecht wird unwahrscheinlich.
description.fr:
Si l'ennemi est du sexe opposé, il
tombe amoureux et rechigne alors à
attaquer.
description.it:
Se il nemico è del sesso opposto,
s'infatua e attacca con meno
probabilità.
description.es:
Si el objetivo es del sexo opuesto,
se enamorará y bajará la
posibilidad de que ataque.
description.ja:
♂なら♀を　♀なら♂を　ゆうわくして メロメロに　する。
あいては　わざが　だしにくく　なる。
description.tw:
If it is the opposite gender of the
user, the target becomes infatuated
and less likely to attack.

name.ja: わざマシン - どろぼう

description.en:
An attack which steals the foe's
held item if the user isn't already
holding one. Its effects are
temporary when stealing from
Trainers.
description.cn: 如果自身没携带道具, 可偷走对手道具. 对手是训练家时效果是暂时的.
description.de:
Ein Angriff, der den Gegenstand des
Gegners stiehlt, wenn der Anwender
nicht bereits eins in der Hand
hält. Der Effekt ist temporär, wenn
von Trainern gestohlen wird.
description.fr:
Une attaque qui vole l'objet tenu
par l'adversaire si le lanceur n'en
tient pas déjà un. Ses effets sont
temporaires lorsqu'utilisé contre
un dresseur.
description.it:
Attacco che ruba lo strumento tenuto
dal nemico se l'utilizzatore non ne
tiene già uno. L'effetto è
temporaneo quando viene rubato agli
Allenatori.
description.es:
Ataque que roba el objeto que lleva
el enemigo si el usuario no lleva
uno. Sus efectos son temporales al
robar a otros entrenadores.
description.ja:
An attack which steals the foe's
held item if the user isn't already
holding one.  Its effects are
temporary when stealing from
Trainers.  It will not steal from a
wild ポケモン if they faint.
description.tw: 如果自身沒攜帶道具, 可偷走對手道具. 對手是訓練家時效果是暫時的.

name.ja: わざマシン - ローキック

description.en:
The user attacks the target's legs
swiftly, reducing the target's
Speed stat.
description.cn:
The user attacks the target's legs
swiftly, reducing the target's
Speed stat.
description.de:
Anwender greift mit blitzschnellen
Bewegungen die Beine des Zieles an
und senkt dessen Initiative.
description.fr:
Un coup rapide qui vise les pieds de
l'ennemi et diminue sa Vitesse.
description.it:
Chi la usa colpisce con un attacco
fulmineo la parte inferiore del
corpo del bersaglio, riducendone la
Velocità.
description.es:
Un veloz ataque a los pies que
reduce la Velocidad del objetivo.
description.ja:
すばやい　うごきで　あいての　あしを ねらって　こうげきする。
あいての　すばやさを　さげる。
description.tw:
The user attacks the target's legs
swiftly, reducing the target's
Speed stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - りんしょう

description.en:
The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round
and make the attack do greater
damage.
description.cn:
The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round
and make the attack do greater
damage.
description.de:
Angriff mit Gesang. Singt der
Anwender mit allen im Kanon, steigt
die Stärke.
description.fr:
Le lanceur attaque l'ennemi en
chantant. Si plusieurs Pokémon
déclenchent cette attaque à la
suite, l'effet augmente.
description.it:
Attacca il bersaglio con una
melodia. Se usata ripetutamente da
uno o più Pokémon i danni inflitti
aumentano.
description.es:
Un canto que ataca al objetivo.
Cuantos más Pokémon lo usan, más
aumenta de potencia.
description.ja:
うたで　あいてを　こうげきする。 みんなで　りんしょう　すると　つづけて
だすことが　でき　いりょくも　あがる。
description.tw:
The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round
and make the attack do greater
damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - エコーボイス

description.en:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater
damage.
description.cn:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater
damage.
description.de:
Angriff mit widerhallender Stimme.
Wenn in jeder Runde ein Teilnehmer
wiederholt die Attacke einsetzt,
steigt die Stärke.
description.fr:
Un cri retentissant blesse l'ennemi.
Si le lanceur ou d'autres Pokémon
l'utilisent à chaque tour, l'effet
augmente.
description.it:
Attacca il bersaglio con la propria
voce echeggiante. Se usata a
ripetizione da uno o più Pokémon il
danno aumenta.
description.es:
Un susurro que aumenta de potencia
conforme el usuario y otros Pokémon
lo van utilizando.
description.ja:
ひびく　こえで　あいてを　こうげきする。 まいターン　だれかが　わざを
つかい　つづけると　いりょくが　あがる。
description.tw:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater
damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - オーバーヒート

description.en:
The user attacks the target at full
power. The attack's recoil harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.
description.cn:
The user attacks the target at full
power. The attack's recoil harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.
description.de:
Angriff mit voller Kraft, der den
Spezial-Angriff des Anwenders durch
den Rückstoß stark senkt.
description.fr:
Attaque l'ennemi à pleine puissance.
Le contrecoup baisse énormément
l'Attaque Spéciale du lanceur.
description.it:
Chi la usa sferra un potente
attacco, ma il contraccolpo riduce
di molto il suo Attacco Speciale.
description.es:
Ataque en toda regla que baja mucho
el Ataque Especial de quien lo
usa.
description.ja:
フルパワーで　あいてを　こうげきする。 つかうと　はんどうで
じぶんの　とくこうが　がくっと　さがる。
description.tw:
The user attacks the target at full
power. The attack's recoil harshly
reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - みねうち

description.en:
A restrained attack that prevents
the target from fainting. The
target is left with at least 1 HP.
description.cn:
A restrained attack that prevents
the target from fainting. The
target is left with at least 1 HP.
description.de:
Ein Angriff, der dem Ziel zumindest
1 KP lässt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur retient ses coups pour
que l'ennemi garde au moins 1 PV et
ne tombe pas K.O.
description.it:
Chi la usa trattiene il colpo per
impedire al nemico di andare KO,
lasciandolo con almeno un PS.
description.es:
Ataque moderado que no debilita al
objetivo y le deja al menos un PS.
description.ja:
あいての　ＨＰが　 かならず　１だけ　のこる　ように
てかげん　して　こうげきする。
description.tw:
A restrained attack that prevents
the target from fainting. The
target is left with at least 1 HP.

name.ja: わざマシン - なげつける

description.en:
The user flings its item at the foe,
destroying it. In PvP, only
consumable items are destroyed
permanently. The move's power and
effects vary depending on what item
is thrown.
description.cn:
快速投掷携带的道具进行攻击. PvP 中仅可消耗道具会被永久销毁.
根据道具不同, 威力和效果会改变.
description.de:
Der Benutzer schleudert seinen
Gegenstand auf den Feind und
zerstört ihn. Im PvP werden nur
verbrauchbare Gegenstände dauerhaft
zerstört. Die Kraft und die Effekte
des Moves variieren je nachdem,
welcher Gegenstand geworfen wird.
description.fr:
Le lanceur jette son objet sur
l'ennemi, le détruisant. En PvP,
seul les objets consommables sont
détruits de manière permanente. La
puissance de l'attaque dépend de
l'objet jeté.
description.it:
L'utilizzatore lancia il suo
strumento all'avversario,
distruggendolo. Nel PvP, solo gli
strumenti consumabili sono
distrutti permanentemente. La
potenza e gli effetti della mossa
dipendono dallo strumento
lanciato.
description.es:
El usuario arroja su objeto contra
el enemigo, destruyéndolo. En PvP,
sólo los objetos consumibles son
destruidos permanentemente. La
potencia del movimiento y sus
efectos varían dependiendo del
objeto arrojado.
description.ja:
The user flings its item at the foe,
destroying it. In PvP, only
consumable items are destroyed
permanently. The move's power and
effects vary depending on what item
is thrown.
description.tw:
快速投擲攜帶的道具進行攻擊. PvP 中僅可消耗道具會被永久銷燬.
根據道具不同, 威力和效果會改變.

name.ja: わざマシン - チャージビーム

description.en:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any
remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.
description.cn:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any
remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.
description.de:
Ziel wird von einem Elektrostrahl
getroffen. Steigert eventuell
Spezial- Angriff des Anwenders.
description.fr:
Le lanceur tire un rayon chargé
d'électricité. Peut aussi augmenter
son Attaque Spéciale.
description.it:
Chi la usa lancia un fascio di
elettricità molto intensa. Può
anche aumentare il suo Attacco
Speciale.
description.es:
Lanza un rayo eléctrico contra el
objetivo. Puede subir el Ataque
Especial de quien lo usa.
description.ja:
でんげきの　たばを　あいてに はっしゃする。でんきを　ためて　じぶんの
とくこうを　あげることが　ある。
description.tw:
The user attacks with an electric
charge. The user may use any
remaining electricity to raise its
Sp. Atk stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - やきつくす

description.en:
The user attacks the target with
fire. If the target is holding a
Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up
and unusable.
description.cn:
The user attacks the target with
fire. If the target is holding a
Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up
and unusable.
description.de:
Eine Feuer-Attacke. Trägt das Ziel
eine Beere bei sich, wird diese von
den Flammen verzehrt und geht
verloren.
description.fr:
Des flammes calcinent l'ennemi. S'il
tient une Baie, elle est brûlée et
devient inutilisable.
description.it:
Attacca il nemico con una fiammata.
Se il nemico ha una Bacca, viene
divorata dalle fiamme.
description.es:
Llamas que golpean a los objetivos
adyacentes. Si estos llevan Bayas,
estas se quemarán y ya no se podrán
usar.
description.ja:
ほのおで　あいてを　こうげきする。 あいてが　きのみを　もっている　とき
もやして　つかえなく　する。
description.tw:
The user attacks the target with
fire. If the target is holding a
Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up
and unusable.

name.ja: わざマシン - さきおくり

description.en:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.
description.cn:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.
description.de:
Anwender stemmt sich gegen das Ziel
und bewirkt, dass dieses erst als
Letztes angreift.
description.fr:
Retient la cible de force,
l'obligeant à agir en dernier.
description.it:
Chi la usa trattiene il bersaglio,
costringendolo ad agire per
ultimo.
description.es:
El usuario intimida a su objetivo
logrando que su movimiento sea el
último del turno.
description.ja: あいてを　おさえつけて こうどうの　じゅんばんを さいごに　する。
description.tw:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.

name.ja: わざマシン - おにび

description.en:
The user shoots a sinister,
bluish-white flame at the target to
inflict a burn.
description.cn:
The user shoots a sinister,
bluish-white flame at the target to
inflict a burn.
description.de:
Angriff mit unheimlicher Flamme, die
das Ziel verbrennt.
description.fr:
Lance une sinistre flamme violette à
l'ennemi pour lui infliger une
brûlure.
description.it:
Fiamme intense di colore viola
causano una scottatura al nemico.
description.es:
Siniestra llama morada que produce
quemaduras.
description.ja:
ぶきみで　あやしい　ほのおを　はなって あいてを　やけどの　じょうたい
に　する。
description.tw:
The user shoots a sinister,
bluish-white flame at the target to
inflict a burn.

name.ja: わざマシン - アクロバット

description.en:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive
damage.
description.cn:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive
damage.
description.de:
Ein graziler Angriff auf das Ziel.
Trägt der Anwender kein Item bei
sich, richtet die Attacke großen
Schaden an.
description.fr:
Attaque agile. Si le lanceur ne
tient pas d'objet, l'attaque
inflige davantage de dégâts.
description.it:
Attacca rapidamente il bersaglio. Se
chi la usa non ha uno strumento,
infligge al nemico grossi danni.
description.es:
Golpea ágilmente. Si el usuario no
porta ningún objeto, el objetivo
resulta seriamente dañado.
description.ja:
かろやかに　あいてを　こうげきする。 じぶんが　どうぐを　もっていな
い　とき おおきな　ダメージを　あたえる。
description.tw:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive
damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - さしおさえ

description.en:
It prevents the target from using
its held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.
description.cn:
It prevents the target from using
its held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.
description.de:
Verhindert, dass auf das Ziel Items
verwendet werden.
description.fr:
Empêche l'ennemi d'utiliser un objet
tenu et son Dresseur d'utiliser un
objet sur lui.
description.it:
Impedisce al nemico di usare lo
strumento che tiene e al suo
Allenatore di usarne altri sul
Pokémon.
description.es:
Impide al objetivo usar el objeto
que lleva. Su Entrenador tampoco
puede usar objetos sobre él.
description.ja:
もたせた　どうぐを　つかえなくする。 トレーナーも　その　ポケモンには
どうぐを　つかえない。
description.tw:
It prevents the target from using
its held item. Its Trainer is also
prevented from using items on it.

name.ja: わざマシン - だいばくはつ

description.en:
The user explodes to inflict damage
on those around it. The user faints
upon using this move.
description.cn:
The user explodes to inflict damage
on those around it. The user faints
upon using this move.
description.de:
Anwender explodiert, richtet bei
allen Pokémon in seiner Umgebung
großen Schaden an und wird
besiegt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur explose et inflige des
dégâts à tous les Pokémon autour de
lui. Met K.O. le lanceur.
description.it:
Chi la usa esplode per infliggere
danni agli altri Pokémon attorno,
ma va KO.
description.es:
El atacante explota y hiere a todos
a su alrededor. El usuario se
debilita de inmediato.
description.ja:
おおきな　ばくはつで　じぶんの まわりに　いるものを　こうげきする。
つかった　あとに　ひんしに　なる。
description.tw:
The user explodes to inflict damage
on those around it. The user faints
upon using this move.

name.ja: わざマシン - シャドークロー

description.en:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made from shadows. Critical hits
land more easily.
description.cn:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made from shadows. Critical hits
land more easily.
description.de:
Das Ziel wird mit scharfen Klauen
aus der Schattenwelt attackiert.
Hohe Volltrefferquote.
description.fr:
Attaque avec une griffe puissante
faite d'ombres. Taux de critiques
élevé.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca con artigli
d'ombra che colpiscono con gran
forza. Probabile brutto colpo.
description.es:
Ataca con una garra afilada hecha de
sombras. Suele ser crítico.
description.ja:
かげから　つくった　するどい　ツメで あいてを　きりさく。
きゅうしょに　あたりやすい。
description.tw:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made from shadows. Critical hits
land more easily.

name.ja: わざマシン - かたきうち

description.en:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally. If an ally fainted in the
previous turn, this attack's damage
increases.
description.cn:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally. If an ally fainted in the
previous turn, this attack's damage
increases.
description.de:
Anwender nimmt Rache für einen
besiegten Mitstreiter. Wurde in der
vorigen Runde ein Mitstreiter
besiegt, steigt die Kraft.
description.fr:
Venge un Pokémon de l'équipe mis
K.O. Si un Pokémon de l'équipe a
été mis K.O. au tour d'avant,
l'effet augmente.
description.it:
Vendica un compagno messo KO. Se ciò
è accaduto al turno precedente, il
danno è maggiore.
description.es:
Venga a los amigos derrotados. Si en
el turno anterior han derrotado a
uno, la potencia del ataque
aumentará.
description.ja:
たおれた　みかたの　かたきを　うつ。 まえの　ターンに　みかたが　たお
されて いると　いりょくが　あがる。
description.tw:
The user gets revenge for a fainted
ally. If an ally fainted in the
previous turn, this attack's damage
increases.

name.ja: わざマシン - ギガインパクト

description.en:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power. The user
must rest on the next turn.
description.cn:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power. The user
must rest on the next turn.
description.de:
Anwender rennt mit seiner ganzen
Kraft gegen das Ziel an und muss
dann eine Runde ruhen.
description.fr:
Le lanceur charge l'ennemi de toute
sa puissance. Il doit ensuite se
reposer au tour suivant.
description.it:
Chi la usa carica il nemico usando
tutta la sua forza, ma al turno
successivo deve riposare.
description.es:
Carga contra el objetivo usando toda
la fuerza que tiene. El Pokémon
descansa el turno siguiente.
description.ja:
もてる　ちからを　すべて　つかって あいてに　とつげきする。
つぎの　ターンは　うごけなく　なる。
description.tw:
The user charges at the target using
every bit of its power. The user
must rest on the next turn.

name.ja: わざマシン - ロックカット

description.en:
The user polishes its body to reduce
drag. It can sharply raise the
Speed stat.
description.cn:
The user polishes its body to reduce
drag. It can sharply raise the
Speed stat.
description.de:
Anwender reduziert so gut wie
möglich den Luftwiderstand. Kann
Initiative-Wert stark steigern.
description.fr:
Le lanceur polit son corps pour
diminuer sa résistance au vent.
Augmente fortement la Vitesse.
description.it:
Chi la usa leviga il proprio corpo
per ridurne l'attrito. Aumenta di
molto la Velocità.
description.es:
Reduce la resistencia puliendo su
cuerpo. Aumenta la Velocidad
considerablemente.
description.ja:
じぶんの　からだを　みがいて　くうきの ていこうを　すくなくする。すば
やさを ぐーんと　あげることが　できる。
description.tw:
The user polishes its body to reduce
drag. It can sharply raise the
Speed stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - ボルトチェンジ

description.en:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.
description.cn:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.
description.de:
Anwender kehrt nach dem Angriff mit
atem- beraubender Geschwindigkeit
zurück und tauscht Platz mit einem
anderen Pokémon.
description.fr:
Après son attaque, le lanceur
revient à toute vitesse et change
de place avec un Pokémon de
l'équipe prêt au combat.
description.it:
Chi usa questa mossa fa marcia
indietro per farsi sostituire dopo
aver sferrato l'attacco.
description.es:
Tras atacar, vuelve a toda prisa
para dar paso a otro Pokémon del
equipo.
description.ja:
こうげき　したあと ものすごい　スピードで　もどってきて
ひかえ　ポケモンと　いれかわる。
description.tw:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

name.ja: わざマシン - でんじは

description.en:
A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.
description.cn:
A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.
description.de:
Ein schwacher Stromstoß, der das
Ziel paralysiert.
description.fr:
Un faible choc électrique frappe
l'ennemi. Si l'attaque touche,
celui-ci est paralysé.
description.it:
Il nemico viene colpito da una
debole scarica elettrica che, se va
a segno, ne causa la paralisi.
description.es:
Una ligera descarga que paraliza al
objetivo si lo alcanza.
description.ja:
よわい　でんげきを　あびせる　ことで あいてを　まひ　じょうたいに　す
る。
description.tw:
A weak electric charge is launched
at the target. It causes paralysis
if it hits.

name.ja: わざマシン - ジャイロボール

description.en:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.
description.cn:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.
description.de:
Angriff mit hoher Geschwindigkeit.
Je niedriger die Initiative des
Anwenders, desto mehr Schaden.
description.fr:
Le lanceur effectue une rotation et
frappe l'ennemi. Plus le lanceur
est lent, plus il fait de dégâts.
description.it:
Chi la usa colpisce il nemico con un
vortice rapidissimo. Più lento è
chi la usa, maggiore è il danno.
description.es:
Embiste al objetivo con un potente
ataque giratorio. Cuanto más lento
es el usuario, más daño causa.
description.ja:
からだを　こうそくに　かいてん　させて たいあたりする。あいてより　す
ばやさが おそいほど　つよい。
description.tw:
The user tackles the target with a
high-speed spin. The slower the
user, the greater the damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - つるぎのまい

description.en:
A frenetic dance to uplift the
fighting spirit. It sharply raises
the user's Attack stat.
description.cn:
A frenetic dance to uplift the
fighting spirit. It sharply raises
the user's Attack stat.
description.de:
Ein wilder Kampftanz, der den
eigenen Angriffs-Wert stark
erhöht.
description.fr:
Danse frénétique qui exalte l'esprit
combatif. Augmente beaucoup
l'Attaque du lanceur.
description.it:
Danza frenetica che incrementa lo
spirito combattivo. Chi la usa
aumenta di molto il suo Attacco.
description.es:
Baile frenético que aumenta mucho el
Ataque.
description.ja:
たたかいのまいを　はげしく　おどって きあいを　たかめる。
じぶんの　こうげきを　ぐーんと　あげる。
description.tw:
A frenetic dance to uplift the
fighting spirit. It sharply raises
the user's Attack stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - むしのていこう

description.en:
While resisting, the user attacks
the opposing Pokémon. The targets'
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
description.cn:
While resisting, the user attacks
the opposing Pokémon. The targets'
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
description.de:
Anwender leistet Widerstand und
greift an. Der Spezial-Angriff der
Ziele sinkt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur se débat de toutes ses
forces, et baisse l'Attaque
Spéciale de l'ennemi.
description.it:
Colpisce i nemici opponendo
resistenza e riducendo il loro
Attacco Speciale.
description.es:
El usuario contraataca. Además baja
el Ataque Especial de los
oponentes.
description.ja:
ていこう　して　あいてを　こうげきする。 あいての　とくこうを　さげ
る。
description.tw:
While resisting, the user attacks
the opposing Pokémon. The targets'
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name.ja: わざマシン - じこあんじ

description.en:
The user hypnotizes itself into
copying any stat change made by the
target.
description.cn:
The user hypnotizes itself into
copying any stat change made by the
target.
description.de:
Der Anwender hypnotisiert sich
selbst, um die Statusveränderungen
des Zieles zu kopieren.
description.fr:
Une autohypnose qui permet au
lanceur de copier les changements
de stats de la cible.
description.it:
Chi la usa s'ipnotizza per copiare
ogni modifica alle statistiche del
bersaglio.
description.es:
Quien lo usa se hipnotiza y copia
cualquier cambio que haya en las
características de su objetivo.
description.ja:
じぶんに　あんじを　かけることで のうりょく　へんかの　じょうたいを
あいてと　おなじにする。
description.tw:
The user hypnotizes itself into
copying any stat change made by the
target.

name.ja: わざマシン - じならし

description.en:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is
reduced.
description.cn:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is
reduced.
description.de:
Anwender greift an, indem er den
Boden um sich herum plattwalzt. Die
Initiative aller betroffenen
Pokémon sinkt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur piétine le sol et inflige
des dégâts à tous les Pokémon
autour de lui. Baisse aussi la
Vitesse.
description.it:
Chi la usa calpesta il terreno e
scatena un terremoto che danneggia
tutti i Pokémon nei paraggi e ne
riduce anche la Velocità.
description.es:
Ataca con una sacudida sísmica que
afecta a los Pokémon adyacentes en
combate y baja su Velocidad.
description.ja:
じめんを　ふみならして　じぶんの まわりに　いるものを　こうげきする。
あいての　すばやさを　さげる。
description.tw:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area.
Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is
reduced.

name.ja: わざマシン - こおりのいぶき

description.en:
The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results
in a critical hit.
description.cn:
The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results
in a critical hit.
description.de:
Anwender greift an, indem er dem
Ziel eisigen Atem entgegenhaucht.
Volltreffergarantie.
description.fr:
Un souffle froid blesse l'ennemi.
L'effet est toujours critique.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca il bersaglio con
un soffio d'aria gelida. Brutto
colpo assicurato.
description.es:
Ataque con aire helado. Siempre
resulta en un golpe crítico.
description.ja:
つめたい　いきを あいてに　ふきつけて　こうげきする。
かならず　きゅうしょに　あたる。
description.tw:
The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results
in a critical hit.

name.ja: わざマシン - いわなだれ

description.en:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. It
may also make the targets flinch.
description.cn:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. It
may also make the targets flinch.
description.de:
Schleudert riesige Felsen auf Gegner
in der Umgebung, die eventuell
zurückschrecken.
description.fr:
Envoie de gros rochers sur l'ennemi
pour infliger des dégâts. Peut
aussi l'apeurer.
description.it:
I nemici vengono colpiti da grandi
massi che possono anche farli
tentennare.
description.es:
Lanza grandes pedruscos. Puede hacer
retroceder al objetivo.
description.ja:
おおきな　いわを はげしく　ぶつけて　こうげきする。
あいてを　ひるませる　ことが　ある。
description.tw:
Large boulders are hurled at the
opposing team to inflict damage. It
may also make the targets flinch.

name.ja: わざマシン - シザークロス

description.en:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.
description.cn:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.
description.de:
Der Anwender führt eine Attacke aus,
die einer Scherenbewegung ähnelt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur taillade l'ennemi en
utilisant ses faux ou ses griffes
comme une paire de ciseaux.
description.it:
Chi la usa colpisce il nemico usando
le sue falci o i suoi artigli come
se fossero delle forbici.
description.es:
Cruza las guadañas o las garras para
atacar al objetivo como si fueran
unas tijeras.
description.ja:
カマや　ツメを　ハサミのように こうさ　させながら　あいてを　きりさ
く。
description.tw:
The user slashes at the target by
crossing its scythes or claws as if
they were a pair of scissors.

name.ja: わざマシン - ドラゴンテール

description.en:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.
description.cn:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.
description.de:
Putzt das Ziel vom Feld und wechselt
es mit einem anderen Pokémon aus.
Beendet Kämpfe gegen wilde
Pokémon.
description.fr:
Un coup puissant qui blesse la cible
et l'envoie balader. Dans la
nature, met fin au combat.
description.it:
Chi la usa fa volar via il bersaglio
in modo che venga sostituito. Se il
bersaglio è un Pokémon selvatico,
la lotta finisce.
description.es:
Ataca al objetivo y lo obliga a
cambiarse por otro Pokémon. Si es
uno salvaje, acaba el combate.
description.ja:
あいてを　はじきとばして ひかえの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
やせいの　ばあいは　せんとうが　おわる。
description.tw:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its
party. In the wild, the battle
ends.

name.ja: わざマシン - ふるいたてる

description.en:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.
description.cn:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.
description.de:
Anwender erhält einen Kraftschub,
der seinen Angriff und Spez.-Angr.
erhöht.
description.fr:
Le lanceur se rengorge. Augmente
l'Attaque et l'Attaque Spéciale.
description.it:
Chi la usa si tira su di morale,
aumentando il proprio Attacco e
l'Attacco Speciale.
description.es:
Movimiento que aumenta el Ataque y
el Ataque Especial de quien lo
usa.
description.ja: じぶんを　ふるいたてて こうげきと　とくこうを　あげる。
description.tw:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.

name.ja: わざマシン - どくづき

description.en:
The target is stabbed with a
tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
It may also poison the target.
description.cn:
The target is stabbed with a
tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
It may also poison the target.
description.de:
Ziel wird mit vergiftetem Arm oder
Tentakel verletzt. Es wird dabei
eventuell vergiftet.
description.fr:
Attaque l'ennemi avec un tentacule
ou un bras plein de poison. Peut
aussi l'empoisonner.
description.it:
Il nemico è colpito da un tentacolo
o da un arto intriso di una
sostanza tossica. Può anche
avvelenarlo.
description.es:
Pincha al objetivo con un tentáculo
o brazo envenenado. Puede llegar a
envenenar al objetivo.
description.ja:
どくに　そまった　しょくしゅや　うでで あいてを　つきさす。
どく　じょうたいに　することが　ある。
description.tw:
The target is stabbed with a
tentacle or arm steeped in poison.
It may also poison the target.

name.ja: わざマシン - ゆめくい

description.en:
The user eats the dreams of a
sleeping target. It absorbs half
the damage caused to heal the
user's HP.
description.cn:
The user eats the dreams of a
sleeping target. It absorbs half
the damage caused to heal the
user's HP.
description.de:
Attacke gegen schlafendes Ziel. Die
Hälfte des zugefügten Schadens wird
dem Anwender gutgeschrieben.
description.fr:
Le lanceur mange le rêve de l'ennemi
endormi. Le lanceur récupère en PV
la moitié des dégâts infligés.
description.it:
Attacco che funziona solo su un
nemico che dorme. Chi lo usa riceve
metà dei PS persi dal nemico.
description.es:
Restaura al usuario la mitad del
daño causado a un objetivo
dormido.
description.ja:
ねている　あいての　ゆめを　たべて こうげきする。　ダメージの　はんぶ
んの ＨＰを　かいふく　する。
description.tw:
The user eats the dreams of a
sleeping target. It absorbs half
the damage caused to heal the
user's HP.

name.ja: わざマシン - くさむすび

description.en:
The user snares the target with
grass and trips it. The heavier the
target, the greater the damage.
description.cn:
The user snares the target with
grass and trips it. The heavier the
target, the greater the damage.
description.de:
Ziel wird durch Gras ins Straucheln
gebracht. Je schwerer das Ziel,
desto mehr Schaden.
description.fr:
L'ennemi est piégé dans de l'herbe
qui le fait trébucher. Plus il est
lourd, plus il subit de dégâts.
description.it:
Chi la usa intrappola il nemico con
l'erba e lo fa cadere. Danneggia
maggiormente i nemici più pesanti.
description.es:
Enreda al objetivo con hierba y lo
derriba. Cuanto más pesado es el
objetivo, más daño inflige.
description.ja:
くさを　からませて　あいてを ころばせる。あいてが　おもいほど
いりょくが　あがる。
description.tw:
The user snares the target with
grass and trips it. The heavier the
target, the greater the damage.

name.ja: わざマシン - いばる

description.en:
The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, it also sharply
raises the target's Attack stat.
description.cn:
The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, it also sharply
raises the target's Attack stat.
description.de:
Verwirrt das Ziel und erhöht dessen
Angriffs-Wert stark.
description.fr:
Fait enrager la cible et la plonge
dans la confusion, mais augmente
fortement son Attaque.
description.it:
Chi la usa provoca il bersaglio e lo
confonde, facendo aumentare però di
molto il suo Attacco.
description.es:
Provoca confusión en el objetivo,
pero también sube mucho su Ataque.
description.ja:
あいてを　おこらせて　こんらん　させる。 いかりで　あいての　こうげきは
ぐーんと　あがってしまう。
description.tw:
The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, it also sharply
raises the target's Attack stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - ついばむ

description.en:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.
description.cn:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.
description.de:
Anwender pickt das Ziel, nimmt die
Beere, falls das Ziel eine hält,
und erhält ihren Effekt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur picore la cible. Si cette
dernière tient une Baie, le lanceur
la mange et profite de ses effets.
description.it:
Chi la usa becca il bersaglio.
Inoltre, se questi tiene una Bacca,
gliela ruba e ne sfrutta gli
effetti.
description.es:
Picotea al objetivo. Si este
sostiene una Baya, la picotea
también y obtiene sus efectos.
description.ja:
くちばしで　こうげき。 あいてが　きのみを　もっている　とき
たべて　きのみの　こうかを　うけられる。
description.tw:
The user pecks the target. If the
target is holding a Berry, the user
eats it and gains its effect.

name.ja: わざマシン - とんぼがえり

description.en:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.
description.cn:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.
description.de:
Nach der Attacke eilt der Anwender
zurück und tauscht den Platz mit
einem anderen Pokémon.
description.fr:
Après son attaque, le lanceur
revient à toute vitesse et change
de place avec un Pokémon de
l'équipe prêt au combat.
description.it:
Chi usa questa mossa si tira
indietro per farsi sostituire dopo
aver sferrato l'attacco.
description.es:
Tras atacar, vuelve a toda prisa
para dar paso a otro Pokémon del
equipo.
description.ja:
こうげき　したあと ものすごい　スピードで　もどってきて
ひかえ　ポケモンと　いれかわる。
description.tw:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.

name.ja: わざマシン - みがわり

description.en:
The user makes a copy of itself
using some of its HP. The copy
serves as the user's decoy.
description.cn:
The user makes a copy of itself
using some of its HP. The copy
serves as the user's decoy.
description.de:
Anwender setzt eine kleine Menge an
KP ein, um einen Doppelgänger zu
erzeugen, der für ihn Schläge
einsteckt.
description.fr:
Le lanceur fait une copie de
lui-même en sacrifiant quelques PV.
La copie sert de leurre.
description.it:
Chi la usa crea una copia di se
stesso usando alcuni PS. La copia
serve come esca per il nemico.
description.es:
Utiliza parte de los PS propios para
crear un sustituto que actúa como
señuelo.
description.ja:
じぶんの　ＨＰを　すこし　けずって ぶんしんを　だす。
ぶんしんは　じぶんの　みがわりに　なる。
description.tw:
The user makes a copy of itself
using some of its HP. The copy
serves as the user's decoy.

name.ja: わざマシン - ラスターカノン

description.en:
The user gathers all its light
energy and releases it at once. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.
description.cn:
The user gathers all its light
energy and releases it at once. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.
description.de:
Anwender sammelt Lichtenergie und
feuert sie auf einmal ab. Senkt
eventuell Spezial-Verteidigung des
Zieles.
description.fr:
Le lanceur concentre son énergie
lumineuse et la fait exploser. Peut
aussi baisser la Défense Spéciale
de l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa attacca raccogliendo e
rilasciando energia luminosa. Può
ridurre la Difesa Speciale del
nemico.
description.es:
El usuario concentra toda la luz del
cuerpo y la libera. Puede bajar la
Defensa Especial del objetivo.
description.ja:
からだの　ひかりを　いってんに　あつめて ちからを　はなつ。あいての　
とくぼうを さげることが　ある。
description.tw:
The user gathers all its light
energy and releases it at once. It
may also lower the target's Sp. Def
stat.

name.ja: わざマシン - トリックルーム

description.en:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which slower Pokémon get to move
first for five turns.
description.cn:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which slower Pokémon get to move
first for five turns.
description.de:
Anwender erzeugt einen bizarren
Raum, in dem langsame Pokémon fünf
Runden lang zuerst agieren.
description.fr:
Le lanceur crée une zone étrange où
les Pokémon les plus lents frappent
en 1⑩ pendant 5 tours.
description.it:
Chi la usa crea una dimensione in
cui i Pokémon più lenti si muovono
per primi per cinque turni.
description.es:
Se crea un espacio extraño en el que
los Pokémon lentos se mueven
primero durante cinco turnos.
description.ja:
まかふしぎな　くうかんを　つくる。 ５ターンの　あいだ
おそい　ポケモンから　こうどう　できる。
description.tw:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which slower Pokémon get to move
first for five turns.

description.en: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground
description.cn: 装着有助于探险且方便使用的道具的袋子。有了它就可以进入地下通道
description.de: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground
description.fr: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground
description.it: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground
description.es: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground
description.ja: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground
description.tw: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground

description.en: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine
description.cn: 结实的大袋子。可以将在煤矿里获得的宝物放进去
description.de: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine
description.fr: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine
description.it: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine
description.es: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine
description.ja: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine
description.tw: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry loot obtained in the coal mine

description.en: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use
description.cn: 写着对战规则。在进行连接对战时，可以选择规则
description.de: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use
description.fr: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use
description.it: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use
description.es: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use
description.ja: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use
description.tw: It lists the rules for holding battles. For linked battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use

description.en: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk
description.cn: 能够将藏在草丛里的宝可梦找出来的道具。走路就能给电池充电
description.de: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk
description.fr: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk
description.it: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk
description.es: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk
description.ja: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk
description.tw: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk

description.en: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned
description.cn: 可以查看赢得的对战点数的卡片
description.de: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned
description.fr: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned
description.it: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned
description.es: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned
description.ja: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned
description.tw: A card that lists the Battle Points you have earned

description.en: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far
description.cn: 记录着到现在为止的冒险经历的笔记
description.de: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far
description.fr: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far
description.it: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far
description.es: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far
description.ja: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far
description.tw: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far

description.en: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls
description.cn: 放有贴在球壳上的贴纸的容器
description.de: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls
description.fr: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls
description.it: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls
description.es: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls
description.ja: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the Capsule cases of Poké Balls

Emana un odore un po' aspro.
description.es: Bonguri de color azul y aroma tierno.
description.ja:
あおい　ぼんぐり。
すこし　あおくさい　かおりがする。
description.tw:
A blue Apricorn.
It smells a bit like grass.

description.en:
A yellow Apricorn.
It has an invigorating scent.
description.cn:
A yellow Apricorn.
It has an invigorating scent.
description.de:
Eine gelbe Aprikoko.
Sie riecht ein wenig unreif.
description.fr:
Un Noigrume de couleur jaune.
Il dégage un arôme délicat.
description.it:
Una Ghicocca di colore giallo.
Emana un profumo delicato.
description.es:
Bonguri de color amarillo y aroma
refrescante.
description.ja:
きいろの　ぼんぐり。
さわやかな　かおりが　する。
description.tw:
A yellow Apricorn.
It has an invigorating scent.

description.en:
A green Apricorn.
It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.
description.cn:
A green Apricorn.
It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.
description.de:
Eine grüne Aprikoko. Sie verströmt
einen seltsam aromatischen Duft.
description.fr:
Un Noigrume de couleur verte.
Il dégage un arôme étonnamment riche.
description.it:
Una Ghicocca di colore verde.
Emana un profumo intenso.
description.es:
Bonguri de color verde y aroma
peculiar
que recuerda al café tostado.
description.ja:
みどりの　ぼんぐり。
ふしぎと　こうばしい　かおりがする。
description.tw:
A green Apricorn.
It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.

description.en:
A pink Apricorn.
It has a nice, sweet scent.
description.cn:
A pink Apricorn.
It has a nice, sweet scent.
description.de:
Eine pinkfarbene Aprikoko. Sie duftet
süß und appetitanregend.
description.fr:
Un Noigrume de couleur rose.
Il dégage un arôme sucré.
description.it:
Una Ghicocca di colore rosa.
Emana un profumo dolce.
description.es: Bonguri de color rosa y aroma dulce.
description.ja:
ももいろの　ぼんぐり。
あまそうな　いい　においがする。
description.tw:
A pink Apricorn.
It has a nice, sweet scent.

description.en:
A white Apricorn.
It doesn't smell like anything.
description.cn:
A white Apricorn.
It doesn't smell like anything.
description.de:
Eine weiße Aprikoko.
Riecht nach überhaupt nichts.
description.fr:
Un Noigrume de couleur blanche.
Il ne dégage aucun arôme.
description.it:
Una Ghicocca di colore bianco.
Non emana alcun odore.
description.es:
Bonguri de color blanco que no
desprende aroma alguno.
description.ja:
しろい　ぼんぐり。
なんの　においも　しない。
description.tw:
A white Apricorn.
It doesn't smell like anything.

description.en:
A black Apricorn
It has an indescribable scent.
description.cn:
A black Apricorn
It has an indescribable scent.
description.de:
Eine schwarze Aprikoko. Sie riecht
irgendwie unbeschreiblich.
description.fr:
Un Noigrume de couleur noire.
Il dégage un arôme indéfinissable.
description.it:
Una Ghicocca di colore nero.
Emana un odore indefinibile.
description.es:
Bonguri de color negro y aroma
indescriptible.
description.ja:
くろい　ぼんぐり。
なんともいえない　においがする。
description.tw:
A black Apricorn
It has an indescribable scent.

description.en:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon with high base
Speed.
description.cn: 能很容易地捕捉速度种族值很高的Pokémon的Poké Ball.
description.de:
Ein Pokéball, die sich hervorragend
zum Fangen von Pokémon mit hoher
Basisgeschwindigkeit eignet.
description.fr:
Une excellente Poké Ball pour capturer
des Pokémon avec une vitesse de base
élevée.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball ottima per catturare
Pokémon con una Velocità di base
alta.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball excelente para capturar
Pokémon con alta Velocidad base.
description.ja:
A モンスターボール which is excellent at
capturing ポケモン with high base Speed.
description.tw: 能很容易地捕捉速度種族值很高的Pokémon的Poké Ball.

description.en:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon who are the same
level as yours.
description.cn:
能很容易地捕捉和自己的Pokémon等级相同的Pokémon的Poké
Ball.
description.de:
Ein Pokéball, der sich hervorragend
für das Fangen von Pokémon eignet,
die das gleiche Level wie das Deine
haben.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball qui est excellente pour
capturer des Pokémon qui sont du même
niveau que le vôtre.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball ottima per catturare
Pokémon dello stesso livello dei
tuoi.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball la cual es excelente
capturando Pokémon que tienen el
mismo nivel que el tuyo.
description.ja:
A モンスターボール which is excellent at
capturing ポケモン who are the same level
as yours.
description.tw:
能很容易地捕捉和自己的Pokémon等級相同的Pokémon的Poké
Ball.

description.en:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon
hooked
by a Rod when fishing.
description.cn:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon
hooked
by a Rod when fishing.
description.de:
Ein Ball, der sich besonders gut
eignet, um Pokémon zu fangen,
die an deiner Angel hängen.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien sur
les
Pokémon ferrés avec une canne à
pêche.
description.it:
Poké Ball un po' originale che
funziona
particolarmente bene sui Pokémon
pescati con un Amo.
description.es:
Poké Ball algo distinta, especialment
e
indicada para capturar los Pokémon
que se han pescado con una Caña.
description.ja:
つりざおで　つりあげた　ポケモンだと
つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。
description.tw:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon
hooked
by a Rod when fishing.

description.en:
A Poké Ball for catching very heavy
Pokémon.
description.cn:
A Poké Ball for catching very heavy
Pokémon.
description.de:
Ein Ball, der sich besonders gut
eignet,
um Pokémon mit hohem Körpergewicht
zu fangen.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien sur
les Pokémon lourds.
description.it:
Poké Ball un po' originale che
funziona
particolarmente bene sui Pokémon
pesanti.
description.es:
Poké Ball algo distinta que funciona
especialmente bien a la hora de
atrapar
Pokémon de mucho peso.
description.ja:
たいじゅうの　おもい　ポケモンが
つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。
description.tw:
A Poké Ball for catching very heavy
Pokémon.

description.en:
A Poké Ball which is excellent at
capturing Pokémon of the same
evolution line as yours, but of the
opposite gender. It doesn't help
against genderless foes.
description.cn:
能很容易地捕捉和自己同进化链的性别不同的Pokémon的Poké Ball.
对无性别的无效.
description.de:
Ein Pokéball, der hervorragend
geeignet ist, Pokémon der gleichen
Evolutionslinie wie die eigene, aber
des anderen Geschlechts, zu fangen.
Er hilft nicht gegen geschlechtslose
Gegner.
description.fr:
Une excellente Poké Ball pour capturer
les Pokémon de la même ligne
d'évolution que la vôtre, mais du
sexe opposé. Elle n'est d'aucune
utilité contre les ennemis sans
genre.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball ottima per catturare
Pokémon della stessa linea evolutiva
dei tuoi, ma di genere opposto. Non
ha effetto su nemici asessuati.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball excelente para capturar
Pokémon de la misma línea evolutiva
que la tuya, pero del sexo opuesto.
No funciona con enemigos sin género.
description.ja:
A モンスターボール which is excellent at
capturing ポケモン of the same evolution
line as yours, but of the opposite
gender. It doesn't help against
genderless foes.
description.tw:
能很容易地捕捉和自己同進化鏈的性別不同的Pokémon的Poké Ball.
對無性別的無效.

description.en:
A Poké Ball which makes a Pokémon very
happy upon capture. It works well on
Pokémon which evolve due to
happiness.
description.cn:
让捉到的野生Pokémon立刻变得和训练家亲密起来的Poké Ball.
对依靠亲密度进化的Pokémon作用显著.
description.de:
EinePokéball, das ein Pokémon nach dem
Fangen sehr glücklich macht. Er
funktioniert gut bei Pokémon, die
sich aufgrund von Glück entwickeln.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball qui rend un Pokémon très
heureux lors de sa capture. Elle
fonctionne bien sur les Pokémon qui
évoluent grâce au bonheur.
description.it:
Una Poké Ball che rende un Pokémon
molto felice dopo la cattura.
Funziona bene sui Pokémon che
evolvono tramite felicità.
description.es:
Una Poké Ball que hace al Pokémon muy
feliz al capturarlo. Funciona bien
con Pokémon que evolucionan por
felicidad.
description.ja:
A モンスターボール which makes a ポケモン very
happy upon capture. It works well on
ポケモン which evolve due to happiness.
description.tw:
讓捉到的野生Pokémon立刻變得和訓練家親密起來的Poké Ball.
對依靠親密度進化的Pokémon作用顯著.

description.en:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that
evolve using the Moon Stone.
description.cn:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that
evolve using the Moon Stone.
description.de:
Ein Ball, der sich besonders gut
eignet,
um Pokémon zu fangen, die sich durch
einen Mondstein weiterentwickeln.
description.fr:
Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien sur
les
Pokémon évoluant avec une Pierre
Lune.
description.it:
Poké Ball un po' originale che
funziona
particolarmente bene sui Pokémon
che si evolvono con una Pietralunare.
description.es:
Poké Ball algo distinta que atrapa
con
más facilidad los Pokémon que
evolucionan con la Piedra Lunar.
description.ja:
つきのいしで　しんかする　ポケモンが
つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。
description.tw:
A Poké Ball for catching Pokémon that
evolve using the Moon Stone.

A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists
like to buy and take home. It
restores
the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.

A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists
like to buy and take home. It
restores
the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.
description.de:
Eine Spezialität aus Mahagonia City.
Sie wird gern als Souvenir gekauft.
description.fr:
Un bonbon, spécialité d'Acajou.
Il constitue un cadeau très réputé.
description.it:
Caramella tipica di Mogania.
Souvenir con un'ottima reputazione.
description.es:
Caramelo típico de Pueblo Caoba,
muy popular como souvenir.
description.ja:

like to buy and take home. It

the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.

description.en:
A mysterious scale that evolves
certain Pokémon.
It shines in rainbow colors.
description.cn:
A mysterious scale that evolves
certain Pokémon.
It shines in rainbow colors.
description.de:
Eine seltsame Schuppe, durch die sich
bestimmte Pokémon entwickeln. Sie
funkelt in den Farben des Regenbogen
s.
description.fr:
Une écaille étrange qui fait évoluer
certaines espèces de Pokémon.
Elle a une couleur arc-en-ciel.
description.it:
Squama misteriosa che fa evolvere
determinate specie di Pokémon.
Riflette i colori dell'arcobaleno.
description.es:
Curiosa piedra que hace evolucionar
a determinadas especies de Pokémon.
Brilla con los colores del arcoíris.
description.ja:
ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　ウロコ。
にじいろに　かがやいている。
description.tw:
A mysterious scale that evolves
certain Pokémon.
It shines in rainbow colors.

description.en:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp.
Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
description.cn:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp.
Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.
description.de:
Ein mysteriöser Klumpen, der die
Vert.
u. Spez.-Vert. von Pokémon erhöht,
die sich noch entwickeln können.
description.fr:
Un étrange concentré d'évolution qui
augmente la Défense et la Déf. Spé.
d'un Pokémon pouvant évoluer.
description.it:
Misteriosa sfera evolutiva. Aumenta
la
Difesa e la Difesa Speciale di un
Pokémon
che può ancora evolversi.
description.es:
Piedra evolutiva. El Pokémon portador
aumentará su Defensa y su Defensa
Especial si aún puede evolucionar.
description.ja:
しんかの　ふしぎな　かたまり。
もたせると　しんかまえ　ポケモンの
ぼうぎょと　とくぼうが　あがる。
description.tw:
A mysterious evolutionary lump. When
held, it raises the Defense and Sp.
Def
of a Pokémon that can still evolve.

description.en:
A very light stone. It reduces the
weight of a Pokémon when held.
description.cn:
A very light stone. It reduces the
weight of a Pokémon when held.
description.de:
Ein federleichter Stein, der das
Gewicht des Trägers verringert.
description.fr:
Une pierre très légère.
Elle réduit le poids du
Pokémon qui la tient.
description.it:
Pietra leggerissima che riduce il
peso
del Pokémon che la tiene.
description.es:
Piedra muy ligera que reduce el peso
del Pokémon que la lleve.
description.ja:
とても　かるい　いし。
もたせると　ポケモンの
たいじゅうが　かるくなる。
description.tw:
A very light stone. It reduces the
weight of a Pokémon when held.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder of this item is hit by a
move that makes contact, it will
inflict damage on the attacker for
16.67% of their maximum HP per-hit.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.

受到接触类攻击时, 攻击方损失自身最大HP的16.67%.
description.de:
Ein Gegenstand, der von einem Pokémon
gehalten werden kann.
Wird der Träger dieses Gegenstandes
von einer Bewegung getroffen, die
Kontakt herstellt, fügt er dem
Angreifer pro Treffer 16,67% seiner
maximalen KP als Schaden zu.
description.fr:
Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.
Si le porteur de cet objet est touché
par une capacité qui établit un
contact, il infligera des dégâts à
l'attaquant pour 16,67% de ses PV
maximum par coup.
description.it:
Strumento da far tenere a un Pokémon.
Se chi lo tiene viene colpito da una
mossa che fa contatto, infliggerà
all'avversario un danno pari al
16.67% dei suoi PS massimi per ogni
colpo.
description.es:
Objeto que debe llevar un Pokémon.
Si el Pokémon que lleva este objeto es
golpeado por un movimiento que hace
contacto, infligirá un daño al
atacante igual al 16,67% de sus PS
máximos por golpe.
description.ja:
An item to be held by a ポケモン.

If the holder of this item
is hit by a move that makes contact,
it will inflict damage on the
attacker
for 16.67% of their maximum HP
per-hit.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.

受到接觸類攻擊時, 攻擊方損失自身最大HP的16.67%.

description.en:
When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon
will float into the air. When the
holder
is attacked, this item will burst.
description.cn:
When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon
will float into the air. When the
holder
is attacked, this item will burst.
description.de:
Gibt man es einem Pokémon zum Tragen,
fängt es an zu schweben. Wird es
getroffen, platzt das Item.
description.fr:
Tenu par un Pokémon, cet objet lui
permet de flotter dans les airs.
Il éclate en cas d'attaque.
description.it:
Permette al Pokémon che lo tiene di
fluttuare in aria. Scoppia se è
colpito
da un attacco.
description.es:
El Pokémon que lo lleve flotará en el
aire. Si recibe un golpe, estallará.
description.ja:
ポケモンに　もたせると
ポケモンが　ちゅうに　うく。
こうげきを　うけると　われてしまう。
description.tw:
When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon
will float into the air. When the
holder
is attacked, this item will burst.

description.en:
A card with a mysterious power. When
the holder is struck by a foe, the
attacker is removed from battle.
description.cn:
A card with a mysterious power. When
the holder is struck by a foe, the
attacker is removed from battle.
description.de:
Eine Karte mit mysteriösen Kräften.
Wird der Träger getroffen, wird der
Angreifer des Platzes verwiesen.
description.fr:
Carte au pouvoir mystérieux.
Tenue, elle force un Pokémon touchant
le porteur à se retirer du combat.
description.it:
Cartellino dal potere misterioso.
Chi lo tiene fa ritirare dalla lotta
il Pokémon che lo ha colpito.
description.es:
Misteriosa tarjeta que permite al
Pokémon que la lleve expulsar al
agresor cuando este le cause daño.
description.ja:
ふしぎな　ちからのある　カード。
もたせると　わざをうけた　あいてを
たいじょう　させることが　できる。
description.tw:
A card with a mysterious power. When
the holder is struck by a foe, the
attacker is removed from battle.

description.en: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it
description.cn: 原本因宝可梦的属性相克关系而无效的招式现在会变得能够击中自己
description.de: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it
description.fr: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it
description.it: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it
description.es: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it
description.ja: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it
description.tw: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it

description.en:
When held by a Pokémon, it causes the
damage inflicted by binding moves
used by the holder to increase from
12.5% to 16.7% of the opponent's
maximum HP at the end of each turn.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
携带者使用的绑紧招式, 所造成的束缚状态伤害从每回合12.5%提升
到16.7%.
description.de:
Wenn es von einem Pokémon gehalten
wird, erhöht sich der Schaden, der
durch bindende Attacken des Besitzers
verursacht wird, am Ende jeder Runde
von 12,5% auf 16,7% der maximalen KP
des Gegners.
description.fr:
Lorsque tenu par un Pokémon, augmente
les dégâts infligés par les
mouvements étreignants utilisés par
le détenteur de 12,5% à 16,7% des PV
maximum de l'adversaire à la fin de
chaque tour.
description.it:
Quando tenuto da un Pokémon, aumenta
il danno inflitto dall'utilizzatore
tramite mosse intrappolanti dal 12.5%
al 16.7% dei PS massimi dell'avversa
rio alla fine di ogni turno.
description.es:
Cuando lo lleva un Pokémon, provoca
que el daño infligido por movimientos
de atadura usados por quien lo lleva
aumente de 12,5% a 16,7% de los PS
máximos del oponente al final de cada
turno.
description.ja:
When held by a ポケモン,
it causes the damage inflicted by
binding
moves used by the holder to increase
from 12.5% to 16.7% of the opponent's
maximum HP at the end of each turn.
description.tw:
給Pokémon攜帶的道具.
攜帶者使用的綁緊招式, 所造成的束縛狀態傷害從每回合12.5%提升
到16.7%.

description.en:
A consumable bulb. If the holder is
hit
by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk
will rise.
description.cn:
A consumable bulb. If the holder is
hit
by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk
will rise.
description.de:
Eine einmalig einsetzbare Knolle.
Erhöht den Spez.-Angr. des Trägers,
wenn ihn eine Wasser-Attacke trifft.
description.fr:
Bulbe jetable. Tenu, il augmente la
Défense Spéciale lorsque le Pokémon
subit une attaque de type Eau.
description.it:
Bulbo monouso. Se il Pokémon che
lo tiene subisce una mossa di tipo
Acqua, il suo Attacco Speciale
aumenta.
description.es:
Raíz de usar y tirar que sube el
Ataque
Especial cuando se recibe un ataque
de tipo Agua.
description.ja:
つかいすての　きゅうこん。
もたせて　みずの　わざを　うけると
とくこうが　あがる。
description.tw:
A consumable bulb. If the holder is
hit
by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk
will rise.

description.en:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.
description.cn:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.
description.de:
Ein einmalig aufladbarer Akku.
Erhöht den Angriff des Trägers, wenn
ihn eine Elektro-Attacke trifft.
description.fr:
Pile jetable. Tenue, elle augmente
l'Attaque lorsque le Pokémon subit
une attaque de type Électrik.
description.it:
Pila monouso. Se il Pokémon che la
tiene subisce un attacco di tipo
Elettro, il suo Attacco aumenta.
description.es:
Batería de usar y tirar que sube
el Ataque de quien la lleva cuando
recibe un golpe de tipo Eléctrico.
description.ja:
つかいすての　じゅうでんち。
もたせて　でんきの　わざを　うけると
こうげきが　あがる。
description.tw:
A consumable battery. If the
holder is hit by an Electric-type
move, its Attack will rise.

description.en:
If the holder is hit by an attack, it
will
switch with another Pokémon in
your party.
description.cn:
If the holder is hit by an attack, it
will
switch with another Pokémon in
your party.
description.de:
Wird der Träger getroffen, flieht er
aus dem Kampf und wird mit einem
Team-Pokémon ausgetauscht.
description.fr:
Si le Pokémon qui le tient subit une
attaque, il s'enfuit pour être
remplacé
par un autre membre de l'équipe.
description.it:
Se il Pokémon che lo tiene è colpito
da
un attacco, viene immediatamente
sostituito da un compagno.
description.es:
Si el portador es alcanzado por un
ataque, saldrá del combate y será
sustituido por otro Pokémon del
equipo.
description.ja:
もたせて　わざを　うけると
せんとうから　だっしゅつして
てもちと　いれかわる　ことができる。
description.tw:
If the holder is hit by an attack, it
will
switch with another Pokémon in
your party.

description.en:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It increases the power of Fire-type
moves by 50%.

This item is consumed upon use.
description.cn:
给Pokémon携带的道具.
火系技能威力提升50%.

一次性消耗品.
description.de:

gehalten werden kann.

Typs Feuer um 50 %.

Dieser Gegenstand wird bei Verwendung
verbraucht.

Un objet à faire tenir à un Pokémon.

capacités de type Feu.

l'utilisation.

50%.

de tipo Fuego un 50%.

description.en:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base HP of a
single Pokémon.
description.cn:
An item for use on a Pokémon. It
slightly increases the base HP of a
single Pokémon.
description.de:
Schenkt man einem Pokémon dieses
Item, wird dessen Basis-KP-Anzahl
dauerhaft erhöht.
description.fr:
Objet à utiliser sur un Pokémon.
Il augmente un peu ses PV lors
d'une montée de niveau.
description.it:
Strumento da usare su un Pokémon.
Ne aumenta di poco i PS al salire di
livello.
description.es:
Pluma que aumenta un poco los PS
de un Pokémon al subir de nivel.
description.ja:
ポケモンに　つかう　どうぐ。
ポケモン　１ひきの　ＨＰの
きそポイントを　ちょっと　あげる。

single Pokémon.

name.ja: わざマシン - ワイルドボルト

description.en:
The user shrouds itself in
electricity and smashes into its
target. It also damages the user a
little.
description.cn:
The user shrouds itself in
electricity and smashes into its
target. It also damages the user a
little.
description.de:
Anwender erzeugt Spannung und greift
an, indem er auf Kollisionskurs
geht. Er selbst erleidet dabei
ebenfalls leichten Schaden.
description.fr:
Une charge électrique violente qui
blesse aussi légèrement le
lanceur.
description.it:
Chi la usa si carica di elettricità
per poi scagliarsi sul bersaglio,
ma subisce dei danni per il
contraccolpo.
description.es:
Carga eléctrica muy potente que
también hiere ligeramente a quien
la usa.
description.ja:
でんきを　まとって あいてに　ぶつかって　こうげきする。
じぶんも　すこし　ダメージを　うける。
description.tw:
The user shrouds itself in
electricity and smashes into its
target. It also damages the user a
little.

name.ja: わざマシン - バークアウト

description.en:
The user yells as if it is ranting
about something, making the
target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.
description.cn:
The user yells as if it is ranting
about something, making the
target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.
description.de:
Wäscht Gegnern in der Nähe mit einer
ausführlichen Standpauke den Kopf
und senkt dabei deren Spezial-Angr
iff.
description.fr:
Le lanceur hurle sur l'ennemi.
Baisse l'Attaque Spéciale de
l'ennemi.
description.it:
Chi la usa si mette a urlare per un
po', riducendo l'Attacco Speciale
dei nemici.
description.es:
Ataca lanzando un chillido
insoportable que baja el Ataque
Especial de los objetivos.
description.ja: まくしたてる　ように　どなりつけて あいての　とくこうを　さげる。
description.tw:
The user yells as if it is ranting
about something, making the
target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.

description.en:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its back.
description.cn:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its back.
description.de:
Das Fossil eines uralten Pokémon,
das in der Tiefsee lebte. Offenbar
handelt sich um einen Teil des
Rückens.
description.fr:
Fossile d'un ancien Pokémon
aquatique. Il semble que ce
soit une partie de son dos.
description.it:
Fossile di un Pokémon preistorico che
viveva nel mare. Sembra essere parte
del suo dorso.
description.es:
Fósil de un Pokémon ancestral que
vivió en el fondo del mar. Parece ser
un fragmento de concha marina.
description.ja:
おおむかし　うみに　すんでいた
こだい　ポケモンの　カセキ。
せなかの　いちぶ　らしい。
description.tw:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
lived in the sea in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its back.

description.en:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.
description.cn:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.
description.de:
Das Fossil eines uralten Pokémon, von
dem man annimmt, dass es der Urahn
der
Vogel-Pokémon sei. Ein Teil des
Flügels.
description.fr:
Fossile d'un ancien Pokémon
volant. Il semble que ce soit
un morceau d'aile.
description.it:
Fossile di un Pokémon preistorico che
solcava i cieli. Sembra essere parte
della sua ala.
description.es:
Fósil de un Pokémon ancestral que
surcó los cielos. Parece ser parte
de un ala suya.
description.ja:
とりポケモンの　そせんと　いわれる
こだい　ポケモンの　カセキ。
つばさの　いちぶ　らしい。
description.tw:
A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that
flew in the sky in ancient times.
It appears to be part of its wing.

description.it:
Carta da lettera con un motivo
colorato sui bordi. Un Pokémon
può tenerla e consegnarla.
description.es:
Carta con el diseño tradicional del
correo aéreo. Haz que la entregue
un Pokémon.
description.ja:
カラフルなびんせんのえがらが
プリントされたびんせん。
ポケモンにもたせてつかう。
description.tw:
Stationery featuring a print of
colorful letter sets.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.
